GP12vamp__u:80: rarāma śaṃbhurbhagavān satyā saha mahādyutiḥ // VamP_2.6 //

GP12vamp__u:95: tathā candramasaṃ devaṃ rohiṇyā sahitaṃ śucim /

GP12vamp__u:328: etacchrutvā vaco raudraṃ rudraḥ krodhāpluto babhau /

GP12vamp__u:335: diśi pratīcyuttarāyāṃ tasthau śūladharo mune // VamP_4.20 //

GP12vamp__u:354: tato varāstrairgaṇanāyakena jitaḥ sa dharmaḥ tarasā prasahya /

GP12vamp__u:375: bhītā hotraṃ parityajya jagmuḥ śaraṇamacyutam // VamP_4.40 //
GP12vamp__u:380: te tasya kāyamāsādya amoghā vai hareḥ śarāḥ /

GP12vamp__u:424: puṣpāñjalipuṭā bhūtvā praṇatāḥ saṃsthitā mune // VamP_5.6 //
GP12vamp__u:426: śakrādīnāṃ sureśānāṃ kṛpaṇaṃ vilalāpa ha // VamP_5.7 //
GP12vamp__u:431: tataḥ pūṣā haraṃ vīkṣya vinighnantaṃ surāsurān /
GP12vamp__u:432: krodhād bāhū prasāryatha pradudrāva maheśvaram // VamP_5.10 //
GP12vamp__u:438: bhrāmayāmāsa satataṃ siṃho mṛgaśiśuṃ yathā // VamP_5.13 //
GP12vamp__u:449: papāta bhuvi niḥsaṃjño vajrāhata ivācalaḥ // VamP_5.18 //
GP12vamp__u:457: namaskṛtya tataḥ sarve tasthuḥ prāñjalayo mune // VamP_5.22 //
GP12vamp__u:459: dadarśa dagdhuṃ kopena sarvāṃścaiva surāmurān // VamP_5.23 //
GP12vamp__u:461: bhayādanye haraṃ dṛṣṭvā gatā vaivasvatakṣayam // VamP_5.24 //
GP12vamp__u:467: śaraṃ pāśupataṃ kṛtvā kālarūpī maheśvaraḥ // VamP_5.27 //
GP12vamp__u:469: arddhena gagane śarvaḥ kālarūpī ca kathyate // VamP_5.28 //
GP12vamp__u:472: lakṣaṇaṃ ca svarūpaṃ ca sarvaṃ vyākhyātumarhasi // VamP_5.29 //
GP12vamp__u:477: meṣo rāśiḥ kujakṣetraṃ tacchiraḥ kālarūpiṇaḥ // VamP_5.31 //
GP12vamp__u:482: ādityāṃśaśca puṣyaṃ ca āśleṣā śaśino gṛham /
GP12vamp__u:487: somaputrasya sadmaitad dvitīyaṃ jaṭharaṃ vibhoḥ // VamP_5.36 //
GP12vamp__u:497: saureḥ sadmāparamidaṃ kumbho jaṅghe ca viśrate // VamP_5.41 //
GP12vamp__u:500: evaṃ kṛtvā kālarūpaṃ trinetro yajñaṃ krodhānmārgarājaghāna /
GP12vamp__u:501: viddhaścāsau vedanābuddhimuktaḥ khe saṃtasthau tārakābhiścitāṅgaḥ // VamP_5.43 //
GP12vamp__u:503: rāśayo gaditā brahmaṃstvayā dvādaśa vai mama /
GP12vamp__u:504: teṣāṃ viśeṣato brūhi lakṣaṇāni svarūpataḥ // VamP_5.44 //
GP12vamp__u:506: svarūpaṃ tava vakṣyāmi rāśīnāṃ śṛṇu nārada /
GP12vamp__u:507: yādṛśā yatra saṃcārā yasmin sthāne vasanti ca // VamP_5.45 //
GP12vamp__u:511: nityaṃ carati phulleṣu sarasāṃ pulineṣu ca // VamP_5.47 //
GP12vamp__u:517: mithunaṃ nāma vikhyātaṃ rāśirdvedhātmakaḥ sthitaḥ // VamP_5.50 //
GP12vamp__u:521: vasate vyādhapallīṣu gahvareṣu guhāsu ca // VamP_5.52 //
GP12vamp__u:523: carate strīratisthāne vasate naḍvaleṣu ca // VamP_5.53 //
GP12vamp__u:531: makaro 'sau nadīcārī vasate ca mahodadhau // VamP_5.57 //
GP12vamp__u:538: etan mayā te kathitaṃ surarṣe yathā trinetraḥ pramātha yajñam /
GP12vamp__u:539: puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ paramaṃ pavitramākhyātavānpāpaharaṃ śivaṃ ca // VamP_5.61 //
GP12vamp__u:545: hariṃ kuṣṇaṃ ca devarṣe nārāyaṇanarau tathā /
GP12vamp__u:548: tapyetāṃ ca tapaḥ saumyau purāṇavṛṣisattmau // VamP_6.3 //
GP12vamp__u:550: gṛmantau tatparaṃ brahma gaṅgāyā vipule taṭe // VamP_6.4 //
GP12vamp__u:552: tāpitaṃ tapasā brahman śakraḥ kṣobhaṃ tadā yayau // VamP_6.5 //
GP12vamp__u:560: niṣpatrāḥ satataṃ rejuḥ śomabhayanto dharātalam // VamP_6.9 //
GP12vamp__u:567: teṣāmanu tathā nīpāḥ piṅkarā iva rejire /
GP12vamp__u:574: vaktukāmā ivāṅgulyā ko 'smākaṃ sadṛśo nagaḥ // VamP_6.16 //
GP12vamp__u:589: yaṃ dadarśa jagannātho devo nārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ // VamP_6.23 //
GP12vamp__u:597: yadā dakṣasutā brahman satī yātā yamakṣayam /
GP12vamp__u:598: vināśya dakṣayajñaṃ taṃ vicacāra trilocanaḥ // VamP_6.26 //
GP12vamp__u:602: vicacāra tadonmattaḥ kānanāni sarāṃsi ca // VamP_6.28 //
GP12vamp__u:604: na śarma lebhe devarṣe bāṇaviddha iva dvipaḥ // VamP_6.29 //
GP12vamp__u:606: nimagne śaṅkare āpo dagdhāḥ kṛṣṇātvamāgatāḥ // VamP_6.30 //
GP12vamp__u:609: tato nadīṣu puṇyāsu sarassu ca nadeṣu ca /
GP12vamp__u:610: puluneṣu ca ramyeṣu vāpīṣu nalinīṣu ca // VamP_6.32 //
GP12vamp__u:611: parvateṣu ca ramyeṣu kānaneṣu ca sānuṣu /
GP12vamp__u:612: vicāran svecchayā naiva śarma lebhe maheśvaraḥ // VamP_6.33 //
GP12vamp__u:613: kṣaṇaṃ gāyati devarṣe kṣaṇaṃ roditi śaṅkaraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:614: kṣaṇaṃ dhyāyati tanvaṅgīṃ dakṣakanyāṃ manoramām // VamP_6.34 //
GP12vamp__u:615: dhyātvā kṣaṇaṃ prasvapiti kṣaṇaṃ svapnāyate haraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:616: svapne tathedaṃ gadati tāṃ dṛṣṭvā dakṣakanyakām // VamP_6.35 //
GP12vamp__u:617: nirghṛṇe tiṣṭha kiṃ mūḍhe tyajase māmanindite /
GP12vamp__u:618: mugdhe tvayā virahito dagdho 'smi madanāgninā // VamP_6.36 //
GP12vamp__u:619: sati satyaṃ prakupitā mā kopaṃ kuru sundari /
GP12vamp__u:621: śrūyase dṛśyase nityaṃ spṛśyase vandyase priye /
GP12vamp__u:622: āliṅgyase ca satataṃ kimarthaṃ nābhibhāṣase // VamP_6.38 //
GP12vamp__u:623: vilapantaṃ janaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛpā kasya na jāyate /
GP12vamp__u:624: viśeṣataḥ patiṃ bāle nanupa tvamatinirghṛṇā // VamP_6.39 //
GP12vamp__u:626: vinā tvayā na jīveyaṃ tadasatyaṃ tvayā kṛtam // VamP_6.40 //
GP12vamp__u:628: nānyathā naśyate tāpaḥ satyenāpi śape priye // VamP_6.41 //
GP12vamp__u:630: utkūjati tathāraṇye muktakaṇṭhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // VamP_6.42 //
GP12vamp__u:631: taṃ kūjamānaṃ vilapantamārāt samīkṣya pācaṃ tarasā vṛṣaketanaṃ hi /
GP12vamp__u:632: vivyādha cāpaṃ tarasā vināmya saṃtāpanāmnā tu śareṇa bhūyaḥ // VamP_6.43 //
GP12vamp__u:633: saṃtāpanāstreṇa tadā sa viddho bhūyaḥ sa saṃtaptataro babhūva /
GP12vamp__u:634: saṃtāpayaṃścāpi jagatsamagraṃ phūtkṛtya phūtkṛtya vivāsate sma // VamP_6.44 //
GP12vamp__u:635: taṃ cāpi bhūyo madano jaghāna vijṛṇbhaṇāstreṇa tato vijṛmbhe /
GP12vamp__u:636: tato bhṛśaṃ kāmaśarairvitunno vijṛmbhamāṇaḥ parito bhramaṃśca // VamP_6.45 //
GP12vamp__u:638: dṛṣṭvā trinetro dhanadasya putraṃ pārśvaṃ samabhyetya vaco babhāṣe /
GP12vamp__u:639: bhrātṛvya vakṣyasi vaco yadadya tat tvaṃ kuruṣvāmitavikramo 'si // VamP_6.46 //
GP12vamp__u:641: yannātha māṃ vakṣyasi tatkariṣye suduṣkaraṃ yadyapi devasaṃghai /
GP12vamp__u:642: ājñāpayasvātulavīrya śaṃbho dāso 'smi te bhaktiyutastatheśa // VamP_6.47 //
GP12vamp__u:645: vijṛmbhaṇonmādasarairvibhinno dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi ratiṃ sukhaṃ vā // VamP_6.48 //
GP12vamp__u:647: nānyaḥ pumān dhārayituṃ hi śakto muktvā bhavantaṃ hi tataḥ pratīccha // VamP_6.49 //
GP12vamp__u:649: ityevamukto vṛṣabhadhvajena yakṣaḥ pratīcchat sa vijṛmbhaṇādīn /
GP12vamp__u:650: toṣaṃ jagāmāśu tatastriśūlī tuṣṭastadaivaṃ vacanaṃ babhāṣe // VamP_6.50 //
GP12vamp__u:653: tasmādvaraṃ tvāṃ pratipūjanāya dāsyāmi lokya ca hāsyakāri // VamP_6.51 //
GP12vamp__u:654: yastvāṃ yadā paśyati caitramāse spṛśennaro vārcayate ca bhaktyā /
GP12vamp__u:655: vṛddho 'tha bālo 'tha yuvātha yoṣit sarve tadonmādadharā bhavanti // VamP_6.52 //
GP12vamp__u:656: gāyanti nṛtyanti ramanti yakṣa vādyāni yatnādapi vādayanti /
GP12vamp__u:657: tavāgrato hāsyavaco 'bhiraktā bhavanti te yogayutāstu te syuḥ // VamP_6.53 //
GP12vamp__u:658: mamaiva nāmnā bhavitāsi pūjyaḥ pāñcālikeśaḥ prathitaḥ pṛthivyām /
GP12vamp__u:659: mama prasādād varado narāṇāṃ bhaviṣyase pūjyatamo 'bhigaccha // VamP_6.54 //
GP12vamp__u:660: ityevamukto vibhunā sa yakṣo jagāma deśān sahasaiva sarvān /
GP12vamp__u:661: kālañjarasyottarataḥ supuṇyo deśo himādrerapi dakṣiṇasthaḥ // VamP_6.55 //
GP12vamp__u:663: tasmin prayāte bhagavāṃstrinetro devo 'pi vindhyaṃ girimabhyagacchat // VamP_6.56 //
GP12vamp__u:665: dṛṣṭvā praharttukāmaṃ ca tataḥ prāduvacaddharaḥ // VamP_6.57 //
GP12vamp__u:667: viveśa ṛṣayo yatra sapatnīkā vyavasthitāḥ // VamP_6.58 //
GP12vamp__u:668: te cāpi ṛṣayaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā mūrdhnā natābhavan /
GP12vamp__u:669: tatastān prāha bhagavān bhikṣā me pratidīyatām // VamP_6.59 //
GP12vamp__u:675: etābhyāṃ bhartṛpūjāsu taccintāsu sthitaṃ manaḥ // VamP_6.62 //
GP12vamp__u:676: tataḥ saṃkṣubhitāḥ sarvā yatra yāti maheśvaraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:679: anuḍajagmuryathā mattaṃ kariṇya iva kuñjaram // VamP_6.64 //
GP12vamp__u:682: tataḥ papāta devasya liṅgaṃ pṛthvīṃ vidārayan /
GP12vamp__u:684: tataḥ sa patito liṅgo vibhidya vasudhātalam /
GP12vamp__u:689: jagāma mādhavaṃ draṣṭuṃ kṣīrodaṃ nāma sāgaram // VamP_6.69 //
GP12vamp__u:690: tatra dṛṣṭvā hṛṣīkeśaṃ praṇipatya ca bhaktitaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:691: uvāca deva bhuvanāḥ kimartha kṣubhitā vibho // VamP_6.70 //
GP12vamp__u:695: tatra gacchāma deveśa evamāha punaḥ punaḥ // VamP_6.72 //
GP12vamp__u:697: ājagmatustamuddeśaṃ yatra liṅgaṃ bhavasya tat // VamP_6.73 //
GP12vamp__u:705: kṛtāñjalipuṭau bhūtvā stotuṃ devaṃ pracakratuḥ // VamP_6.77 //
GP12vamp__u:708: jīmūtavāhana kave śarva tryambaka śaṅkara // VamP_6.78 //
GP12vamp__u:712: bhavānantaśca bhagavān sarvagastvaṃ namo 'stu te // VamP_6.80 //
GP12vamp__u:715: svarūpī tāvidaṃ vākyamuvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ // VamP_6.81 //
GP12vamp__u:720: bhaktaḥ pātitaṃ liṅgaṃ yadetad bhuvi śaṅkara /
GP12vamp__u:721: etat pragṛhyatāṃ bhūya ato deva stuvāvahe // VamP_6.83 //
GP12vamp__u:726: brahma svayaṃ ca jagrāha liṅgaṃ kanakapiṅgalam // VamP_6.85 //
GP12vamp__u:730: tṛtīyaṃ kālavadanaṃ caturthaṃ ca kapālinam // VamP_6.87 //
GP12vamp__u:732: tasya śiṣyo babhūvātha gopāyana iti śrutaḥ // VamP_6.88 //
GP12vamp__u:736: tasya śiṣyobhavadvaiśyo nāmnā krātheśvaro mune // VamP_6.90 //
GP12vamp__u:738: karṇodara iti khyāto jātyā śūdro mahātapāḥ // VamP_6.91 //
GP12vamp__u:739: evaṃ ma bhagavānbrahma pūjanāya śivasya tu /
GP12vamp__u:740: kṛtvā tu cāturāśramyaṃ svameva bhavanaṃ gataḥ // VamP_6.92 //
GP12vamp__u:741: gate ba3hmaṇi śarvo 'pi upasaṃhṛtya taṃ tadā /
GP12vamp__u:742: liṅgaṃ citravane sūkṣmaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya cacāra ha /
GP12vamp__u:748: prādahyata tadā brahman pādādārabhya kakṣavat // VamP_6.96 //
GP12vamp__u:750: utsasarja dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ tajjagāmātha pañcadhā // VamP_6.97 //
GP12vamp__u:754: tajjātaṃ kesarāraṇyaṃ bakulaṃ nāmato mune // VamP_6.99 //
GP12vamp__u:756: jātā sā pāṭalā ramyā bhṛṅgarājivibhūṣitā // VamP_6.100 //
GP12vamp__u:759: ūrddhva muṣṭyā adhaḥ koṭyoḥ sthānaṃ vidrumabhūṣitam /
GP12vamp__u:760: tasmādbhupuṭā mallī saṃjātā vividhā mune // VamP_6.102 //
GP12vamp__u:763: mumoca mārgaṇān bhūmyāṃ śarīre dahyati smaraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:767: evaṃ dagdhvā smaraṃ rudraḥ saṃyamya svatanuṃ vibhuḥ /
GP12vamp__u:768: puṣyārthā śiśirādriṃ sa jagāma tapase 'vyayaḥ // VamP_6.106 //
GP12vamp__u:769: evaṃ purā devavareṇa śaṃbhunā kāmastu dagdhaḥ saśaraḥ sacāpaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:770: tatastvanaṅgeti mahādhanurddharo devaistu gītaḥ surapūrvapūjitaḥ // VamP_6.107 //
GP12vamp__u:775: prahasyaivaṃ vacaḥ prāha kandarva iha āsyatām // VamP_7.1 //
GP12vamp__u:783: amanyata tadānaṅgaḥ kimiyaṃ sā priyā ratiḥ // VamP_7.5 //
GP12vamp__u:787: rājete 'syaḥ kucau pīnau sajjanāvi saṃhatau // VamP_7.7 //
GP12vamp__u:796: jānunī gūḍhagulphe ca śubhe jaṅghe tvaromaśe /
GP12vamp__u:799: kāmāturo 'sau saṃjātaḥ kimutānyo jano mune // VamP_7.13 //
GP12vamp__u:801: kiṃsvit kāmanarendrasya rājadhānī svayaṃ sthitā // VamP_7.14 //
GP12vamp__u:805: tasthau muniriva dhyānamāsthitaḥ sa tu mādhavaḥ // VamP_7.16 //
GP12vamp__u:806: tataḥ sa vismitān sarvān kandarpādīn mahāmune /
GP12vamp__u:807: dṛṣṭvā provāca vacanaṃ smitaṃ kṛtvā śubhavrataḥ // VamP_7.17 //
GP12vamp__u:809: nīyatāṃ suralokāya dīyatāṃ vāsavāya ca // VamP_7.18 //
GP12vamp__u:814: etādśaṃ hi caritaṃ khyātimagryāṃ jagāma ha /
GP12vamp__u:815: pātāleṣu tathā martyai dikṣvaṣṭāsu jagāma ca // VamP_7.21 //
GP12vamp__u:817: abhiṣiktastadā rājye prahlādau nāma dānavaḥ // VamP_7.22 //
GP12vamp__u:819: makhāni bhuvi rājāno yajante vidhivattadā // VamP_7.23 //
GP12vamp__u:821: vaiśyāśca paśuvṛttisthāḥ śūdrāḥ śuśrūṣaṇe ratāḥ // VamP_7.24 //
GP12vamp__u:822: cāturvarṇyaṃ tataḥ sve sve āśrame dharmakarmaṇi /
GP12vamp__u:823: āvarttata tato devā vṛttyā yuktābhavān mune // VamP_7.25 //
GP12vamp__u:825: jagāma narmadāṃ snātuṃ tīrthaṃ caivākulīśvaram // VamP_7.26 //
GP12vamp__u:835: saṃpūjyamāno daityendraḥ prahlādo 'tha dadarśa tam // VamP_7.31 //
GP12vamp__u:843: provāca dharmasaṃyuktaṃ sa vākyaṃ vākyakovidaḥ // VamP_7.35 //
GP12vamp__u:845: bhagavan kāni tīrthāni pṛthivyāṃ kāni cāmbare /
GP12vamp__u:846: rasātale ca kāni syuretad vaktuṃ mamārhasi // VamP_7.36 //
GP12vamp__u:854: uttiṣṭhadhvaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ snātuṃ tīrthaṃ hi naimiṣam /
GP12vamp__u:861: tato ditīśvaraḥ śrīmān mṛgavyāṃ sa cacāra ha /
GP12vamp__u:862: caran sarasvatīṃ puṇyāṃ dadarśa vimalodakām // VamP_7.42 //
GP12vamp__u:864: dadarśa bāṇānaparān mukhe lagnān parasparam // VamP_7.43 //
GP12vamp__u:866: dṛṣṭvātulaṃ tadā cakre krodhaṃ daityeśvaraḥ kila // VamP_7.44 //
GP12vamp__u:870: śārṅgamāgavaṃ caiva akṣyyau ca maheṣudhī // VamP_7.46 //
GP12vamp__u:872: tataḥ provāca vacanaṃ tāvubhau puruṣottamau // VamP_7.47 //
GP12vamp__u:874: kva tapaḥ kva jaṭābhāraḥ kva cemau pravarāyudhau // VamP_7.48 //
GP12vamp__u:875: athovāca naro daityaṃ kā te cintā ditīśvara /
GP12vamp__u:876: sāmarthye sati yaḥ kuryāt tatsaṃpadyeta tasya hi // VamP_7.49 //
GP12vamp__u:880: na kaścicchaknuyād yoddhuṃ naranārāyaṇau yudhi // VamP_7.51 //
GP12vamp__u:883: ityevamuktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā ditīśvaraḥ sthāpya balaṃ vanānte /
GP12vamp__u:884: vitatya cāpaṃ guṇamāvikṛṣya taladhvaniṃ ghorataraṃ cakāra // VamP_7.53 //
GP12vamp__u:885: tato narastvājagavaṃ hi cāpamānamya bāṇān subahuñśitāgrān /
GP12vamp__u:887: chinnān samīkṣyātha naraḥ pṛṣatkān daityeśvareṇāpratimeva saṃkhye /
GP12vamp__u:888: kruddhaḥ samānamya mahādhanustato mumoca cānyān vividhān pṛṣatkān // VamP_7.55 //
GP12vamp__u:889: ekaṃ naro dvau ditijeśvaraśca trīn dharmasūnuścaturo ditīśaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:890: narastu bāṇān pramumoca pañca ṣaḍ dratyanātho niśitān pṛṣatkān // VamP_7.56 //
GP12vamp__u:891: saptarṣimukhyo dvicatuśca daityo narastu ṣaṭ trīṇi ca daityamukhye /
GP12vamp__u:892: ṣaṭtrīṇi caikaṃ ca ditīśvareṇa muktāni bāṇāni narāya vipra // VamP_7.57 //
GP12vamp__u:893: ekaṃ ca ṣaṭ pañca nareṇa muktāstvaṣṭau śarāḥ sapta ca dānavena /
GP12vamp__u:894: ṣaṭ sapta cāṣṭau nava ṣaṇnareṇa dvisaptatiṃ daityapatiḥ sasarjja // VamP_7.58 //
GP12vamp__u:895: śataṃ narastrīṇi śatāni daityaḥ ṣaḍ dharmaputro daśa daityarājaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:896: tato 'pyasaṃkhyeyatarān hi bāṇān mumocatustau subhṛśaṃ hi kopāt // VamP_7.59 //
GP12vamp__u:898: sa cāpi daityapravaraḥ pṛṣatkaiściccheda vegāt tapanīyapuṅkhaiḥ // VamP_7.60 //
GP12vamp__u:901: tatastu daityena varāstrapāṇinā cāpe niyuktaṃ tu pitāmahāstram /
GP12vamp__u:902: maheśvarāstraṃ puruṣottameva samaṃ samāhatya nipetatustau // VamP_7.62 //

GP12vamp__u:1043: yā yā jāyeya me buddhiḥ sā sā viṣṇo tvadāśritā /

GP12vamp__u:1276: tato hutāśaḥ suraśatrusainyaṃ dadāha roṣāt pavanāvadhūtaḥ /

GP12vamp__u:1279: śaktyā mayaṃ śambarametya kaṇṭhe saṃtāḍya jagrāha balānmaharṣe // VamP_10.45 //

GP12vamp__u:1282: sa dahyamāno ditijo 'gninātha suvisvaraṃ ghorataraṃ rurāva /

GP12vamp__u:1284: taṃ śabdamākarṇya ca śambarasya daityeśvaraḥ krodhaviraktadṛṣṭiḥ /

GP12vamp__u:1289: udyamya vegāt parighaṃ hutāśaṃ samādravat tiṣṭha tiṣṭha bruvan hi // VamP_10.50 //

GP12vamp__u:1298: tato vijityāmarasainyasugraṃ sendraṃ sarudraṃ sayamaṃ sasomam /

GP12vamp__u:1322: maharṣin sa tadā dṛṣṭvā praṇipatyābhivādya ca/
GP12vamp__u:1326: kathayantu bhavanto me na cauvājñāpayāmyaham // VamP_11.9 //
GP12vamp__u:1327: kiṃsvicchreyaḥ pare loke kimu ceha dvijottamāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:1328: kena pūjyastathā satsu kenāsau sukhamedhate // VamP_11.10 //
GP12vamp__u:1331: procurvimṛsya śreyor'thamiha loke paratra ca // VamP_11.11 //
GP12vamp__u:1334: yaddhi śreyo bhaved vīra iha cāmutra cāvyayam // VamP_11.12 //
GP12vamp__u:1335: śreyo dharmaḥ pare loke iha ca kṣaṇadācara /
GP12vamp__u:1336: tasmin samāśritaḥ satsu pūjyastena sukhī bhavet // VamP_11.13 //
GP12vamp__u:1339: yamāśritya na sīdanti devādyāstu taducyatām // VamP_11.14 //

GP12vamp__u:2497: indro 'smi rudro 'smi divākaro 'smi sarveṣu lokṣvadhipo 'smi bāle // VamP_20.26 //
GP12vamp__u:2498: na so 'sti nāke na mahītale vā rasātale devabhaṭo 'suro vā /
GP12vamp__u:2499: yo māṃ hi saṃgrāmamupeyivāṃstu bhūto na yakṣo na jijīviṣuryaḥ // VamP_20.27 //
GP12vamp__u:2500: yānyeva ratnāni mahītale vā svarge 'pi pātālatale 'tha mugdhe /
GP12vamp__u:2501: srāvaṇi māmadya samāgatāni vīryārjitānīha viśālanetre // VamP_20.28 //
GP12vamp__u:2502: strīratnamagryaṃ bhavatī ca kanyā prāpto 'smi śailaṃ tava kāraṇena /
GP12vamp__u:2503: tasmād bhajasveha jagatpatiṃ māṃ patistavārhe 'smi vibhuḥ prabhuśca // VamP_20.29 //
GP12vamp__u:2505: ityevamuktā ditijena durgā kātyāyanī prāha mayasya putram /
GP12vamp__u:2506: satyaṃ prabhurdānavarāṭ pṛthivyāṃ satyaṃ ca yuddhe vijitāmarāśca // VamP_20.30 //
GP12vamp__u:2507: kiṃ tvasti daityeśa kule 'smadīye dharmo hi śulkākhya iti prasiddhaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:2508: taṃ cet pradadyānmahiṣo mamādya bhajāmi satyena patiṃ hayārim // VamP_20.31 //
GP12vamp__u:2510: dadyātsvamūrdhānamapi tvadarthe kiṃ nāma śulkaṃ yadihaiva tabhyam // VamP_20.32 //
GP12vamp__u:2513: vihasya caitadvacanaṃ babhāṣe hitāya sarvasya carācarasya // VamP_20.33 //
GP12vamp__u:2515: kule 'smadīye śṛṇu daitya śulkaṃ kṛtaṃ hi yatpūrvataraiḥ prasahya /
GP12vamp__u:2516: yo jeṣyate 'smatkulajāṃ raṇāgre tasyāḥ sa bharttāpi bhaviṣyatīti // VamP_20.34 //
GP12vamp__u:2523: senāgragāminaṃ cakre namaraṃ nāma dānavam // VamP_20.37 //
GP12vamp__u:2527: ūcurvākyaṃ mahādevīṃ varma hyābandha cāmbike // VamP_20.39 //
GP12vamp__u:2528: athovāca surān durgā nāhaṃ badhnāmi devatāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:2529: kavacaṃ ko 'tra saṃtiṣṭhet mamāgre dānavādhamaḥ // VamP_20.40 //
GP12vamp__u:2530: yadā na devyā kavacaṃ kṛtaṃ śastranibarhaṇam /
GP12vamp__u:2532: sā tena rakṣitā brahman durgā dānavasattamam /
GP12vamp__u:2534: evaṃ purā devavareṇa śaṃbhunā tadvaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaramāyatākṣyāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:2535: proktaṃ tayā cāpi hi pādaghātairniṣūdito 'sau mahiṣāsurendraḥ // VamP_20.43 //
GP12vamp__u:2536: evaṃprabhāvo dvija viṣṇupañjaraḥ sarvāsu rakṣāsvadhiko hi gītaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:2537: kastasya kuryād yudhi darphahāniṃ yasya sthitaścetasi cakrapāṇiḥ // VamP_20.44 //
GP12vamp__u:2542: savāhanaṃ hatavatī tathā vistarato vāda // VamP_21.1 //
GP12vamp__u:2543: etacca saṃśayaṃ brahman hṛdi me parivartate /
GP12vamp__u:2548: evaṃ sa namaraḥ kruddhaḥ samāpatata vegavān /
GP12vamp__u:2549: sagajāśvaratho brahman dṛṣṭo devyā yathecchayā // VamP_21.4 //
GP12vamp__u:2563: celuḥ petuśca mamluś ca tatyajuścāpare raṇam // VamP_21.11 //
GP12vamp__u:2568: samāgamya ca vegena devyāḥ śaktiṃ mumoca ha /
GP12vamp__u:2569: triśulamapi siṃhāya prāhiṇod dānavo raṇe // VamP_21.14 //
GP12vamp__u:2571: kṛtāvatha gajendreṇa gṛhīto madhyato hariḥ // VamP_21.15 //
GP12vamp__u:2573: gatāsuḥ suñjaraskandhāt kṣipya daivyai niveditaḥ // VamP_21.16 //
GP12vamp__u:2574: gṛhītvā dānavaṃ madhye brahman kātyāyanī ruṣā /
GP12vamp__u:2575: savyena pāṇinā bhrāmya vādayat pahaṃ yathā // VamP_21.17 //
GP12vamp__u:2585: śātayāmāsa cākramya yathā sasyaṃ mahāśaniḥ // VamP_21.22 //
GP12vamp__u:2589: vavarṣa śarajālāni yathā megho vasundharām // VamP_21.24 //
GP12vamp__u:2595: chinne dhanuṣu khaṅgaṃ ca carma cādattavān balī // VamP_21.27 //
GP12vamp__u:2596: taṃ khaṅga carmaṇā sārdha daityasyādhunvato balāt /
GP12vamp__u:2600: tasyābhipatataḥ pādau karau śīrṣa ca pañcabhiḥ /
GP12vamp__u:2606: ete 'nye ca mahātmāno dānavā balināṃ varāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:2608: tān dṛṣṭvā līlayā durgā vīṇāṃ jagrāha pāṇinā /
GP12vamp__u:2609: vādayāmāsa hasatī tathā ḍamarukaṃ varam // VamP_21.34 //
GP12vamp__u:2610: yathā yathā vādayate devī vādyāni tāni tu /
GP12vamp__u:2611: tathā tathā bhūtagaṇā nṛtyanti ca hasnti ca // VamP_21.35 //
GP12vamp__u:2613: abhyaghnaṃstāṃś ca jagrāha keśeṣu parameśvarī // VamP_21.36 //
GP12vamp__u:2614: prahṛhya keśeṣu mahāsurāṃstān utpatya siṃhāttu nagasya sānum /
GP12vamp__u:2615: nanarta vīṇāṃ parivādayantī papau ca pānaṃ jagato janitrī // VamP_21.37 //
GP12vamp__u:2617: visrastavastrā vyasavaśca jātāḥ tatastu tān vīkṣya mahāsurendrān // VamP_21.38 //
GP12vamp__u:2618: devyā mahaujā mahiṣāsurastu vyadrāvayad bhūtagaṇān khurāgraiḥ /
GP12vamp__u:2619: tuṇḍena pucchena tathorasānyān niḥśvāsavātena ca bhūtasaṃghān // VamP_21.39 //
GP12vamp__u:2621: dudrāva siṃhaṃ yudhi hantukāmaḥ tato 'mbakā krodhavaśaṃ jagāma // VamP_21.40 //
GP12vamp__u:2622: tataḥ sa kopādatha tīkṣṇaśṛṅgaḥ kṣipraṃ girīn bhūmimaśīrṇayacca /
GP12vamp__u:2623: saṃkṣobhayayayaṃstoyanidhīn ghanāṃś ca vidhvaṃsayan prādvatātha gurgām // VamP_21.41 //
GP12vamp__u:2624: sā cātha pāśena babandha duṣṭaṃ sa cāpyabhūt klinnakaṭaḥ karīndraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:2625: karaṃ praciccheda ca hastino 'graṃ sa cāpi bhṛyo mahiṣo 'bhijātaḥ // VamP_21.42 //
GP12vamp__u:2626: tato 'sya śūlaṃ vyasṛjanyamṛḍānī sa śīrṇamūlo nyapatat pṛthivyām /
GP12vamp__u:2627: śaktiṃ pracikṣepa hutāśadattāṃ sā kuṇṭhitāgrā nyapatanamārṣe // VamP_21.43 //
GP12vamp__u:2629: gadāṃ samāvidhya dhaneśvarasya kṣiptātu bhagnā nyapatat pṛthivyām // VamP_21.44 //
GP12vamp__u:2631: nirasya tatkopitayā ca mukto daṇḍastu yāmyo bahukhaṇḍatāṃ gataḥ // VamP_21.45 //
GP12vamp__u:2632: vajraṃ surendrasya ca vigrahe 'sya muktaṃ susūkṣmatvamupājagāma /
GP12vamp__u:2633: saṃtyajya siṃhaṃ mahiṣāsurasya durgādhirūḍhā sahasaiva pṛṣṭham // VamP_21.46 //
GP12vamp__u:2635: sā cāpi padbhyāṃ mṛdukomalābhyāṃ mamarda taṃ klinnamivājinaṃ hi // VamP_21.47 //
GP12vamp__u:2636: sa mṛdyamāno dharaṇīdharābho devyā balī hīnabalo babhūva /
GP12vamp__u:2637: tato 'sya śūlena bibeda kaṇṭhaṃ tasmāt pumān khaṅgadharo vinirgataḥ // VamP_21.48 //
GP12vamp__u:2638: niṣkrāntamātraṃ hṛdaye padā tam āhatya saṃgṛhya kaceṣu kopāt /
GP12vamp__u:2639: śiraḥ praciccheda varāsināsya hāhākṛtaṃ daityabalaṃ tadābhūt // VamP_21.49 //
GP12vamp__u:2642: devyā jayaṃ devāgaṇā vilokya stuvanti devīṃ stutibhirmaharṣe /
GP12vamp__u:2643: nārāyaṇīṃ sarvajagatpratiṣṭhāṃ kātyāyanīṃ ghoramukhīṃ surūpām // VamP_21.51 //
GP12vamp__u:2645: bhūyo bhaviṣyāmyamarārthamevamuktvā surāṃstān praviveśa durgā // VamP_21.52 //
GP12vamp__u:2649: pulastya kathyatāṃ tāvad devyā bhūyaḥ samudbhavaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:2654: yā sā himavataḥ putrī bhavenoḍhā tapodhanā /
GP12vamp__u:2655: umā nāmnā ca tasyāḥ sā kośāñjātā tukauśikī // VamP_22.3 //
GP12vamp__u:2656: saṃbhīya vindhyaṃ gatvā ca bhṛyo bhūtagaṇairvṛtā /
GP12vamp__u:2657: śumbhaṃ caiva niśumbhaṃ ca vadhiṣyati varāyudhaiḥ // VamP_22.4 //
GP12vamp__u:2660: sā jātā himavatputrītyevaṃ me vaktumarhasi // VamP_22.5 //
GP12vamp__u:2661: yathā ca pārvatīkośāt samuddhabhūtā hi kauśikī /
GP12vamp__u:2662: yathā hatavatī śumbhaṃ nisumbhaṃ ca mahāsuram // VamP_22.6 //
GP12vamp__u:2663: kasya cemau sutau vīrau khyātau śumbhaniśumbhakau /
GP12vamp__u:2664: etad vistarataḥ sarvaṃ yathāvad vaktumarhasi // VamP_22.7 //
GP12vamp__u:2667: śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhūtvā skandotpattiṃ ca śāśvatīm // VamP_22.8 //
GP12vamp__u:2674: śvetdavīpe mahāhaṃsaṃ prapannāḥ śaraṇaṃ harim // VamP_22.12 //
GP12vamp__u:2678: yena sarve sametyaivaṃ mama pārśvamupāgatāḥ // VamP_22.14 //
GP12vamp__u:2679: tad yuṣmākaṃ hitārthāya yad vadāmi surottamāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:2680: tatkurudhvaṃ jayo yena samāśritya bhaveddhi vaḥ // VamP_22.15 //
GP12vamp__u:2682: amīṣāṃ mānasī kanyā menā nāmnāsti devatāḥ // VamP_22.16 //
GP12vamp__u:2686: dakṣakopād yayā muktaṃ malavajjīvitaṃ priyam // VamP_22.18 //
GP12vamp__u:2687: sā śaṅkarāt svatejoṃ'śaṃ janayiṣyati yaṃ sutam /
GP12vamp__u:2688: sa haniṣyati daityendraṃ mahiṣaṃ sapadānugam // VamP_22.19 //
GP12vamp__u:2689: tasmād gacchata puṇyaṃ tat kurukṣetraṃ mahāphalam /
GP12vamp__u:2690: tatra pṛthūdake tīrthe pūjyantāṃ pitaro 'vyayaḥ // VamP_22.20 //

GP12vamp__u:2697: ko 'yaṃ kurukṣetra iti yatra puṇyaṃ pṛthūdakam /

GP12vamp__u:2700: yasyāṃ hi pitaro divyāḥ pūjyāsmābhiḥ prayantataḥ // VamP_22.24 //
GP12vamp__u:2706: sa ca pitrā nije rājye bāla evābhiṣecitaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:2711: sarvakarmasu nikṣipya vasiṣṭhaṃ tapasāṃ nidhim // VamP_22.29 //
GP12vamp__u:2715: avitṛpataḥ sugandhasya samantād vyacarad vanam // VamP_22.31 //
GP12vamp__u:2719: tāsāṃ madhye dadarśātha kanyāṃ saṃvaraṇo 'dhikām // VamP_22.33 //
GP12vamp__u:2721: jātaḥ sā ca tamīkṣyaiva kāmabāṇāturābhavat // VamP_22.34 //
GP12vamp__u:2722: ubhau tau pīḍitau mohaṃ jagmatuḥ kāmamārgaṇaiḥ /
GP12vamp__u:2723: rājā calāsano bhūmyāṃ nipapāta turaṅgamāt // VamP_22.35 //
GP12vamp__u:2730: yadāprabhṛti sā dṛṣṭā ārkṣiṇā tapatī girau /
GP12vamp__u:2731: tadāprabhṛti nāśnāti divā svapiti no niśi // VamP_22.39 //
GP12vamp__u:2733: tapatītāpitaṃ vīraṃ pārthivaṃ tapasāṃ nidhiḥ // VamP_22.40 //
GP12vamp__u:2735: viveśa devaṃ tigmāṃśu dadarśa syandane sthitam // VamP_22.41 //
GP12vamp__u:2736: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhāskaraṃ devaṃ praṇamad dvijasattamaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:2739: śobhate vāruṇiḥ śrīmān dvitīya iva bhāskaraḥ // VamP_22.43 //
GP12vamp__u:2743: sutāṃ saṃvaraṇasyārthe tasya tvaṃ dātumarhasi // VamP_22.45 //
GP12vamp__u:2744: tato vasiṣṭhāya divākareṇa niveditā sā tapatī tanūjā /
GP12vamp__u:2745: gṛhāgatāya dvijapuṅgavāya rājñor'thataḥ saṃvaraṇasya devāḥ // VamP_22.46 //
GP12vamp__u:2747: sā cāpi saṃsmṛtya nṛpātmajaṃ taṃ kṛtāñjalirvāruṇimāha devī // VamP_22.47 //
GP12vamp__u:2749: brahman mayā khedamupetya yo hi sahāpsarobhiḥ paricārikābhiḥ /
GP12vamp__u:2751: pādau śubhau cakragadāsicihnau jaṅghe tathorū karihastatulyau /
GP12vamp__u:2752: kaṭistathā siṃhakaṭiryathaiva kṣāmaṃ ca madhyaṃ tribalīnibaddham // VamP_22.49 //
GP12vamp__u:2753: grīvāsya śaṅkhākṛtimādadhāti bhujau ca pīnau kaṭhanausudīrghau /
GP12vamp__u:2754: hastau tathā padmadalodbhavāṅkau chatrākṛtistasya śiro vibhāti // VamP_22.50 //
GP12vamp__u:2755: nīlāśca keśāḥ kuṭilāśca tasya karṇau samāṃsau susamā ca nāsā /
GP12vamp__u:2756: dīrghāśca tasyāṅgulayaḥ suparvāḥ padbhyāṃ karābhyāṃ daśanāśca subhrāḥ // VamP_22.51 //
GP12vamp__u:2759: dvābhyāṃ ca śuklaḥ surābhiścaturbhiḥ dṛśyanti padmāni daśaiva cāsya /
GP12vamp__u:2760: vṛtaḥ sa bhartā bhagavān hi pūrvaṃ taṃ rājaputraṃ bhuvi saṃvicintya // VamP_22.53 //
GP12vamp__u:2761: dadasva māṃ nātha tapasvine 'smai guṇopapannāya samīhitāya /
GP12vamp__u:2762: nehānyakāmāṃ pravadanti santo dātuṃ tathānyasya vibho kṣamasva // VamP_22.54 //
GP12vamp__u:2764: ityevamuktaḥ savituśca putryā ṛṣistadā dhyānaparo babhūva /
GP12vamp__u:2765: jñātvā ca tatrārkasutāṃ sakāmāṃ mudā yuto vākyamidaṃ jagāda // VamP_22.55 //
GP12vamp__u:2766: sa eva putri nṛpatestanūjo dṛṣṭaḥ purā kāmayase yamadya /
GP12vamp__u:2767: sa eva cāyāti mamāśramaṃ vai ṛkṣātmajaḥ saṃvaraṇo hi nāmnā // VamP_22.56 //
GP12vamp__u:2769: dṛṣṭvā vasiṣṭhaṃ praṇipatya mūrdhnā sthitastvapaśyat tapatīṃ narendraḥ // VamP_22.57 //
GP12vamp__u:2770: dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ padmaviśālanetrāṃ tāṃ pūrvadṛṣṭāmiti cintayitvā /
GP12vamp__u:2771: papraccha keyaṃ lalanā dvijendra sa vāruṇiḥ prāha narādhipendram // VamP_22.58 //
GP12vamp__u:2772: iyaṃ vivasvadduhitā narendra nāmnā prasiddhā tapatī pṛthivyām /
GP12vamp__u:2773: mayā tavārthāya divākaro 'rthitaḥ prādānmayā tvāśramamānininye // VamP_22.59 //
GP12vamp__u:2774: tasmāt masuttiṣcha narendra devyāḥ pāṇiṃ tapatyā vidhivad gṛhāṇa /
GP12vamp__u:2775: ityevamukto nṛpatiḥ prahṛṣṭo jagrāha pāṇiṃ vidhivat tapatyāḥ // VamP_22.60 //
GP12vamp__u:2776: sā taṃ patiṃ prāpya mano 'bhirāmaṃ sūryāmajā śakrasamāprabhāvam /
GP12vamp__u:2777: rarāma tanvī bhavanottameṣu yatā mahaindraṃ divi daityakanyā // VamP_22.61 //
GP12vamp__u:2780: tasyāṃ tapatyāṃ narasattamena jātaḥ sutaḥ pārthivalakṣaṇastu /
GP12vamp__u:2781: sa jātakarmādibhireva saṃskṛto vivarddhatājyena huto yathāgniḥ // VamP_23.1 //
GP12vamp__u:2783: navābdikasya vratabandhanaṃ ca vede ca śāstre vidhipārago 'būt // VamP_23.2 //
GP12vamp__u:2785: khyātaḥ pṛthivyāṃ puruṣottamo 'sau nāmnā kuruḥ saṃvaraṇasya putraḥ // VamP_23.3 //
GP12vamp__u:2789: kurorarthāya vatavān sa prādāt kurave 'pi tām // VamP_23.5 //
GP12vamp__u:2791: reme tanvyā saha tayā paulomyā maghavāniva // VamP_23.6 //
GP12vamp__u:2794: tato rājye 'bhiṣiktastu kuruḥ pitrā nije pade /
GP12vamp__u:2795: pālayāmāsa sa mahīṃ putravacca svayaṃ prajāḥ // VamP_23.8 //
GP12vamp__u:2796: sa eva kṣetrapālo 'bhūt paśupālaḥ sa eva hi /
GP12vamp__u:2799: yāvatkīrtiḥ susaṃsthā hi tāvadvāsaḥ suraiḥ saha // VamP_23.10 //
GP12vamp__u:2801: vicacāra mahīṃ sarvāṃ kīrtyarthaṃ tu narādhipaḥ // VamP_23.11 //
GP12vamp__u:2802: tato dvaitavanaṃ nāma puṇyaṃ lokeśvaro balī/ /
GP12vamp__u:2805: plakṣajāṃ brahmaṇaḥ putrīṃ harijihvāṃ sarasvatīm // VamP_23.13 //
GP12vamp__u:2809: samājagāma ca punaḥ brahmaṇo vedimuttarām // VamP_23.15 //
GP12vamp__u:2811: ākamantād yojanāni pañca ca sarvataḥ // VamP_23.16 //
GP12vamp__u:2817: yāsu yaṣṭaṃ sureśena lokanāthena śaṃbhunā // VamP_23.18 //
GP12vamp__u:2823: kariṣyāmi kṛṣiṣyāmi sarvān kāmān yathepsitān // VamP_23.21 //
GP12vamp__u:2826: kṛtvā sīraṃ sa sauvarṇaṃ gahya rudravṛṣaṃ prabhuḥ /
GP12vamp__u:2829: provāca rājan kimidaṃ bhavān kartumihodyataḥ // VamP_23.23 //
GP12vamp__u:2831: provāca rājan kimidaṃ bhavān kartumihodyataḥ // VamP_23.24 //
GP12vamp__u:2832: rājābravīt suravaraṃ tapaḥ satyaṃ kṣamāṃ dayām /
GP12vamp__u:2833: kṛṣāmi śaucaṃ dānaṃ ca yogaṃ ca brahmacāritām // VamP_23.25 //
GP12vamp__u:2839: tadāṣṭāṅgaṃ mahādharmaṃ samākhyātaṃ nṛpeṇa hi // VamP_23.28 //
GP12vamp__u:2840: tato mayāsya gaditaṃ nṛpa bījaṃ kva tiṣṭhati /
GP12vamp__u:2841: sa cāha mama dehasthaṃ bījaṃ tamahamabruvam /
GP12vamp__u:2842: dehyahaṃ vāpayiṣyāmi sīraṃ kṛṣatu vai bhavān // VamP_23.29 //
GP12vamp__u:2844: prasṛtaṃ taṃ bhujaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayā cakreṇa vegataḥ // VamP_23.30 //
GP12vamp__u:2846: tataḥ savyo bhujo rājñā dattaś chinno 'pyasau mayā // VamP_23.31 //

GP12vamp__u:2852: upavāsaṃ ca dānaṃ ca snānaṃ japyaṃ ca mādhava /

GP12vamp__u:2917: kuṭilā ba3hmalokaṃ tu nītā śaśikaraprabhā // VamP_25.6 //
GP12vamp__u:2921: śārvaṃ dhārayituṃ tejo varākī mucyātāṃ tviyam // VamP_25.8 //

GP12vamp__u:2938: sā baddhā sisthitā brahman tatraiva girikanyakā /

GP12vamp__u:2940: yā sā rāgavatī nāma sāpi nītā surairdivam /

GP12vamp__u:2945: yā madvākyamalaṅghyaṃ vai surairlaṅghayase balāt // VamP_25.18 //
GP12vamp__u:2947: yā madvākyamalaṅghyaṃ vai surairlaṅghayase balāt // VamP_25.19 //

GP12vamp__u:2954: tataḥ sā manasā devaṃ śūlapāṇiṃ vṛṣadhvajam /

GP12vamp__u:3289: sthāne tapo duścaramambikāyāścīrṇaṃ mahāneṣa surastu śaṃbhuḥ // VamP_27.30 //

GP12vamp__u:3291: kratoḥ kṣayī dakṣavināśakartā bhagākṣihā śūladharaḥ pinākī // VamP_27.31 //
GP12vamp__u:3292: namo namaḥ śaṅkara śūlapāṇe mṛgāricarmāmbara kālaśatro /
GP12vamp__u:3294: itthaṃ saṃstūyamānaḥ surāpatividhṛtenātapatreṇa śaṃbhuḥ siddhairvandyaḥ sayakṣairahikṛtavalayī cārubhasmopaliphtaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3295: agrasthenāgrajena pramuditamanasā viṣṇunā cānugena vaivāhīṃ maṅgalāḍhyāṃ hutavahamuditāmārurohātha vedīm // VamP_27.33 //
GP12vamp__u:3296: āyāte tripurāntake sahacaraiḥ sārdhaṃ ca spatarṣibhirvyagro 'bhūd girirājaveśmanijanaḥ kālyāḥ samālaṅkṛtau /
GP12vamp__u:3297: vyākulyaṃ samupāgatāśca girayaḥ pūjādinā devatāḥ prāyovyākulitā bhavanti suhṛdaḥ kanyāvivāhotsukāḥ // VamP_27.34 //
GP12vamp__u:3298: prasādhya devīṃ girijāṃ tataḥ strayo dukūlaśuklābhivṛtāṅgayaṣcikām /
GP12vamp__u:3299: bhrātrā sunābena tadotsave kṛte sā śaṅkarābhyāśamathopapāditā // VamP_27.35 //
GP12vamp__u:3300: tataḥ śubhe harmyatale hiraṇmaye sthitāḥ surāḥ saṃkarakāliceṣṭitam /
GP12vamp__u:3301: pasyanti devo 'pi samaṃ kuśāṅgyā lokānujuṣṭaṃ padamāsasāda // VamP_27.36 //
GP12vamp__u:3302: yatra krīḍā vicitrāḥ sakusumataravo vāriṇo bindupātairgandhāḍhyairgandhacūrṇaiḥ praviralamavanau guṇḍitau guṇḍikāyām /
GP12vamp__u:3303: muktādāmaiḥ prakāmaṃ haragiritanayā krīḍanārthaṃ tadāghyanat paścātsindūrapuñjairaviratavitataiś cakratuḥ kṣmāṃ suraktām // VamP_27.37 //
GP12vamp__u:3304: evaṃ krīḍāṃ haraḥ kṛtvā samaṃ ca girikanyayā /
GP12vamp__u:3305: āgacchad dakṣiṇāṃ vedimṛṣibhiḥ sevitāṃ dṛḍhām // VamP_27.38 //
GP12vamp__u:3313: matputrīṃ bhagavan kālīṃ pautrīṃ ca pulahāgraje /
GP12vamp__u:3319: na me 'sti mātā na pitā tathaiva na jñātayo vāpi ca bānadhavāśca /
GP12vamp__u:3320: nirāśrayo 'haṃ kiriśṛṅgavāsī sutāṃ pratīcchāsi tavādrirāja // VamP_27.44 //
GP12vamp__u:3322: sā cāpi saṃsparśamavāpya śaṃbhoḥ parāṃ mudaṃ labdhavatī surarṣe // VamP_27.45 //
GP12vamp__u:3324: dattvā ca lājān kalamasya śuklāṃstato viriñco girijāmuvāca // VamP_27.46 //
GP12vamp__u:3326: samadṛṣṭiḥ sthirā bhūtvā kuruṣvāgneḥ pradakṣiṇam // VamP_27.47 //
GP12vamp__u:3332: kṛto lājāśca haviṣā samaṃ kṣiptā hutāśane // VamP_27.50 //
GP12vamp__u:3334: kiṃ yācasi ca dāsyāmi muñcasveti haro 'bravīt // VamP_27.51 //
GP12vamp__u:3335: mālinī śaṅkaraṃ prāha matsakhyā dehi śaṅkara /
GP12vamp__u:3337: athovāca mahādevo dattaṃ mālini muñca mām /
GP12vamp__u:3338: saubhāgyaṃ nijagotrīyaṃ yo 'syāstaṃ śṛṇu vacmi te // VamP_27.53 //
GP12vamp__u:3340: etadīyo hi saubhāgyo datto 'smadgotrameva hi // VamP_27.54 //
GP12vamp__u:3343: yadā haro hi mālinyā gṛhītaścaraṇe śubhe /
GP12vamp__u:3344: tadā kālīmukhaṃ brahma dadarśa śaśino 'dhikam // VamP_27.56 //
GP12vamp__u:3346: tacchukraṃ bālukāyāṃ ca khilīcakre sasādhvasaḥ // VamP_27.57 //
GP12vamp__u:3348: amī maharṣayo dhanyā vālakhilyāḥ pitāmaha // VamP_27.58 //
GP12vamp__u:3351: tato vivāhe nirvṛtte praviṣṭaḥ kautukaṃ haraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3352: reme sahomayā rātriṃ prabhāte punarutthitaḥ // VamP_27.60 //
GP12vamp__u:3353: tato 'draputrīṃ samavāpya śaṃbhuḥ saraiḥ samaṃ bhūtagaṇaiś ca hṛṣṭaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3354: saṃpūjitaḥ parvatapārthivena sa mandaraṃ śīghramupādajagāma // VamP_27.61 //
GP12vamp__u:3355: tataḥ surān brahmaharīndramukhyān praṇamya saṃpūjya yathāvibhāgam /
GP12vamp__u:3359: tato girau vasan rudraḥ svecchayā vicaran mune /
GP12vamp__u:3360: viśvakarmāṇamāhūya provāca kuru me guham // VamP_28.1 //
GP12vamp__u:3370: tataḥ kadācinnarmārthaṃ kālītyuktā bhavena hi // VamP_28.6 //
GP12vamp__u:3373: vācā duruktāṃ bībhatsaṃ na prarohati vākkṣatam // VamP_28.7 //
GP12vamp__u:3375: na tān vimuñceta hi paṇḍito janastamadya dharma vitathaṃ tvayā kṛtam // VamP_28.8 //
GP12vamp__u:3377: tathā yatiṣye yathā bhavān kālīti vakṣyati // VamP_28.9 //
GP12vamp__u:3381: ṭaṅkacchinnaṃ prayatnena vidhātrā nirmitaṃ tathā // VamP_28.11 //
GP12vamp__u:3382: tato 'vatīrya sasmāra jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ tathā /
GP12vamp__u:3384: tāḥ saṃsmṛtāḥ samājagmuḥ kālīṃ draṣṭuṃ hi devatāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3385: anujñātāstathā devyā śuśrūṣāṃ cakrire śubhāḥ // VamP_28.13 //
GP12vamp__u:3387: samājagāma taṃ deśaṃ vyāghro daṃṣṭrānakhāyudhaḥ // VamP_28.14 //
GP12vamp__u:3389: yadā patiṣyate ceyaṃ tadādāsyāmi vai aham // VamP_28.15 //
GP12vamp__u:3392: tato varṣaśataṃ devī gṛṇantī brahmamaḥ padam /
GP12vamp__u:3393: tapo 'varṣaśataṃ devī gṛṇantī brahma tribhuvaneśvaraḥ // VamP_28.17 //
GP12vamp__u:3395: tapasā dhūtapāpāsi varaṃ vṛṇu yathepsitam // VamP_28.18 //
GP12vamp__u:3397: varado bhava tenāhaṃ yāsye prītimanuttamām // VamP_28.19 //
GP12vamp__u:3399: gāṇapatyaṃ vibhau bhaktimajeyatvaṃ ca dharmitām // VamP_28.20 //
GP12vamp__u:3401: vṛṇīṣva varamavyagrā varaṃ dāsye tavāmbike // VamP_28.21 //
GP12vamp__u:3402: tato varaṃ girisutā prāha devī pitāmaham /
GP12vamp__u:3403: varaḥ pradīyatāṃ mahyaṃ varṇaṃ kanakasaṃnibham // VamP_28.22 //
GP12vamp__u:3404: tathetyuktvā gato brahmā parvatī cābhavat tataḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3406: tasmāt kośācca saṃjātā bhūyaḥ kātyāyanī mune /
GP12vamp__u:3408: provāca girijāṃ devo vākyaṃ svārthāya vāsavaḥ // VamP_28.24 //
GP12vamp__u:3410: iyaṃ pradīyatāṃ mahyaṃ bhaginī me 'stu kauśikī /
GP12vamp__u:3413: sahasrākṣo 'pi tāṃ gṛhya vindhyaṃ vegājjagāma ca // VamP_28.26 //
GP12vamp__u:3415: pūjyamānā surairnāmnā khyātā tvaṃ vindhyavāsinī // VamP_28.27 //
GP12vamp__u:3416: tatra sthāpya harirdevīṃ dattvā siṃhaṃ ca vāhanam /
GP12vamp__u:3418: umāpi taṃ varaṃ labdhvā mandaraṃ punetya ca /
GP12vamp__u:3419: praṇamya ca maheśānaṃ sthitā savinayaṃ mune // VamP_28.29 //
GP12vamp__u:3421: tasthau vraṣasahasraṃ hi mahāmohanake mune // VamP_28.30 //
GP12vamp__u:3423: cakṣubhuḥ sāgarāḥ sapta devāś ca bhayamāgaman // VamP_28.31 //
GP12vamp__u:3424: tataḥ surāḥ sahendreṇa brahmaṇaḥ sadanaṃ gatāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3425: praṇamyocurmaheśānaṃ jagat kṣubdhaṃ tu kiṃ tvidam // VamP_28.32 //
GP12vamp__u:3427: tenākrāntāstvime lokā jagmuḥ kṣobhaṃ duratyayam // VamP_28.33 //
GP12vamp__u:3428: ityuktvā so 'bhavat tūṣṇīṃ tato 'pyūcuḥ surā harim /
GP12vamp__u:3429: āgaccha śakrar gacchāmo yāvat tanna samāpyate // VamP_28.34 //
GP12vamp__u:3431: sa nūnaṃ devarājasya padamaindaṃ hariṣyati // VamP_28.35 //
GP12vamp__u:3434: tataḥ śakraḥ suraiḥ sārdhaṃ vahninā ca sahasradṛk /
GP12vamp__u:3437: cintayitvā tu suciraṃ pāvakaṃ te vyasarjayan // VamP_28.38 //
GP12vamp__u:3438: sa cābhyetya suraśreṣṭho dṛṣṭvā dvāre ca nandinam /
GP12vamp__u:3439: duṣpraveśaṃ ca taṃ matvā cintāṃ vahniḥ parāṃ gataḥ // VamP_28.39 //
GP12vamp__u:3441: niṣkrāmanatīṃ mahāpaṅktiṃ haṃsānāṃ vimalāṃ tathā // VamP_28.40 //
GP12vamp__u:3445: prāha prahasya gambhīraṃ devā dvāri sthitā iti // VamP_28.42 //
GP12vamp__u:3450: tataḥ prītyā surānāha vadadhvaṃ kāryamāśu me /
GP12vamp__u:3457: mamedaṃ teja udriktaṃ kaścid devaḥ pratīcchatu // VamP_28.47 //
GP12vamp__u:3460: asīdanta yathā magnāḥ paṅke vṛndārakā iva // VamP_28.48 //
GP12vamp__u:3462: provāca muñca tejastvaṃ pratīcchāmyeṣa śaṅkara // VamP_28.49 //
GP12vamp__u:3464: jalaṃ tṛṣānate vai yadvat tailapānaṃ pipāsitaḥ // VamP_28.50 //
GP12vamp__u:3465: tataḥ pīte tejasi vai śārve devena vahninā /
GP12vamp__u:3466: svasthāḥ surāḥ samāmantrya haraṃ jagmustriviṣṭapam // VamP_28.51 //
GP12vamp__u:3470: nītaḥ prokto niṣiddhastu putrotpattiṃ tavodarāt // VamP_28.53 //
GP12vamp__u:3472: śaśāpa daivatān sarvān naṣṭaputrodbhavā śivā // VamP_28.54 //
GP12vamp__u:3474: tasmāt te na janaṣyantisvāsuyoṣitsu putrakān // VamP_28.55 //
GP12vamp__u:3476: āhūya mālinīṃ svanātuṃ matiṃ cakre tapodhanā // VamP_28.56 //
GP12vamp__u:3479: tatsvedaṃ pārvatī caiva mene kīdṛgguṇena hi // VamP_28.57 //
GP12vamp__u:3481: tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ śaileyī malāccakre gajānanam // VamP_28.58 //
GP12vamp__u:3483: kṛtvotsasarja bhūmyāṃ ca sthitā bhadrāsane punaḥ // VamP_28.59 //
GP12vamp__u:3485: īṣaddhāsāmumā dṛṣṭvā mālinīṃ prāha nārada // VamP_28.60 //
GP12vamp__u:3489: tacchutvā mama hāso 'yaṃ saṃjāto 'dya kṛśodari // VamP_28.62 //
GP12vamp__u:3491: etacchrutvā vaco devī sasnau tatra vidhānataḥ // VamP_28.63 //
GP12vamp__u:3492: snātvārcya śaṅkaraṃ bhaktyā samabhyāgād gṛhaṃ prati /
GP12vamp__u:3493: tataḥ śaṃbhuḥ samāgatya tasmin bhadrāsane tvapi // VamP_28.64 //
GP12vamp__u:3497: apatyaṃ hi viditvā ca prītimān bhuvaneśvaraḥ // VamP_28.66 //
GP12vamp__u:3499: rudraḥ snātvarcya devādīn vāgbhiradbhiḥ pitṛnapi // VamP_28.67 //
GP12vamp__u:3501: sametya devīṃ vihasan śaṅkaraḥ śūladhṛg vaḥ // VamP_28.68 //
GP12vamp__u:3502: prāha tvaṃ paśya śaileyi svasutaṃ gumasaṃyutam /
GP12vamp__u:3505: tataḥ prīti girisutā taṃ putraṃ pariṣaṣvaje // VamP_28.70 //
GP12vamp__u:3507: nāyakena vinā devi tava bhūto 'pi putrakaḥ // VamP_28.71 //
GP12vamp__u:3512: sahāyaṃ tu gaṇaśreṣṭhaṃ nāmnā khyātaṃ ghaṭodaram /
GP12vamp__u:3513: tathā mātṛgaṇā ghorā bhūtā vighnakarāśca ye // VamP_28.74 //
GP12vamp__u:3515: devī ca svasutaṃ dṛṣṭvā parāṃ mudamavāpa ca // VamP_28.75 //
GP12vamp__u:3517: evaṃ bhūyo 'bhavad devī iyaṃ kātyāyanī vibho /
GP12vamp__u:3518: yā jaghāna mahādaityai purā śumbhaniśumbhakau // VamP_28.76 //
GP12vamp__u:3519: etat tavoktaṃ vacanaṃ śubhākhyaṃ yathodbhavaṃ parvatato mṛḍānyāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3520: svargyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca tathāghahāri ākhyanamūrjaskaramadriputryāḥ // VamP_28.77 //
GP12vamp__u:3525: tasyāḥ putratrayaṃ cāsīt sahasrākṣād balādhikam // VamP_29.1 //
GP12vamp__u:3529: taṃ hantumicchati hariḥ pragṛhya kuliśaṃ kare // VamP_29.3 //
GP12vamp__u:3539: ayaṃ spṛśatu māṃ phenaḥ parābhyāṃ gṛhya dānavaḥ // VamP_29.8 //
GP12vamp__u:3542: tenāsau bhagnanāsāsyaḥ papāta ca mamāra ca /
GP12vamp__u:3543: samaye ca tathā naṣṭe brahmahatyāspṛśaddharim // VamP_29.10 //
GP12vamp__u:3544: sa vai tīrthaṃ samāsādya snātaḥ pāpādamucyata /
GP12vamp__u:3545: tato 'sya bhrātarau vīrau kruddhau sumbhaniśumbhakau // VamP_29.11 //
GP12vamp__u:3549: śakrasyāhṛtya ca gajaṃ yāmyaṃ ca mahiṣaṃ balāt // VamP_29.13 //
GP12vamp__u:3550: varuṇasya maṇicchatraṃ gadāṃ vai mārutatasya ca /
GP12vamp__u:3552: trailokyaṃ vaśagaṃ cāste tābhyāṃ nārada sarvataḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3555: sa cāha daityo 'smi vibho sacivo mahiṣasya tu // VamP_29.16 //
GP12vamp__u:3557: amātyau rucirau vīrau caṇḍamuṇḍāviti śrutau // VamP_29.17 //
GP12vamp__u:3558: tāvāratāṃ salile magnau bhayād devyā mahābhujau /
GP12vamp__u:3559: yastvāsīt prabhūrasmākaṃ mahiṣo nāma dānavaḥ // VamP_29.18 //
GP12vamp__u:3561: bhavantau kasya tanayau kau vā nāmnā piraśrutau /
GP12vamp__u:3564: ahaṃ śuṃbha iti khyāto danoḥ putrastathaurasaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3565: niśumbho 'yaṃ mama bhrātā kanīyān śatrupūgahā // VamP_29.20 //
GP12vamp__u:3567: sametya nirjitā vīrā ye 'nye ca balavattarāḥ // VamP_29.21 //
GP12vamp__u:3571: jalavāsād viniṣkrāntau caṇḍamuṇḍau ca dānavau // VamP_29.23 //
GP12vamp__u:3573: ūcaturvacanaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ ko 'yaṃ tava purassaraḥ // VamP_29.24 //
GP12vamp__u:3574: sa cobhau prāha daityo 'sau śumbho nāma surārdanaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3575: kanīyānasya ca bhrātā dvitīyo hi niśumbhakaḥ // VamP_29.25 //
GP12vamp__u:3576: etāvāśritya tāṃ duṣṭāṃ mahiṣaghnīṃ na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3579: na samyaguktāṃ bhavatā ratnārhe 'si na sāmpratam /
GP12vamp__u:3580: yaḥ prabhuḥ syātsa ratnārhastasmācchumbhāya yojyatām // VamP_29.27 //
GP12vamp__u:3582: bhūyo 'pi tadvidhāṃ jātāṃ kauśikīṃ rūpaśālinīm // VamP_29.28 //
GP12vamp__u:3583: tataḥ śumbho nijaṃ dūtaṃ sugrīvaṃ nāma dānavam /
GP12vamp__u:3584: daityaṃ ca preṣayāmāsa sakāśaṃ vindhyavāsinīm // VamP_29.29 //
GP12vamp__u:3585: sa gatvā tadvacaḥ śrutvā devyāgatya mahāsuraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3591: sa tvāṃ prāha mahābhāge prabhurasmi jagattraye // VamP_29.32 //
GP12vamp__u:3592: yāni svarge mahīṣṭaṣṭhe pātāle cāpi sundari /
GP12vamp__u:3593: ratnāni santi tāvanti mama veśmani nityaśaḥ // VamP_29.33 //
GP12vamp__u:3595: tasmād bhajasvamāṃ vā tvaṃ nuśumbhaṃvā mamānujam // VamP_29.34 //
GP12vamp__u:3596: sā cāha māṃ vihasatī śṛṇu sugrīva madvacaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3597: satyamuktaṃ trilokeśaḥ śumbho ratnārha eva ca // VamP_29.35 //
GP12vamp__u:3598: kiṃ tvasti durvinītāyā hṛdaye me manorathaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3599: yo māṃ vijayate yuddhe sa bhatā syānmahāsura // VamP_29.36 //
GP12vamp__u:3601: sa tvāṃ kathaṃ na jayate sā tvamuttiṣṭha bhāminī // VamP_29.37 //
GP12vamp__u:3602: sātha māṃ prāha kiṃ kurmi yadanālocitaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3603: manorathastu tad gaccha sumbhāya tvaṃ nivedaya // VamP_29.38 //
GP12vamp__u:3605: sā cāgnikoṭisadṛśī matvaivaṃ kuru yatkṣamam // VamP_29.39 //
GP12vamp__u:3608: prāha dūrasthitaṃ sumbho dānavaṃ dhūmralocanam // VamP_29.40 //
GP12vamp__u:3611: sāparādhāṃ yatā dāsīṃ kṛtvā śīghramihānaya // VamP_29.41 //
GP12vamp__u:3613: sa hantavyo 'vicāryaiva yadi hi syāt pitāmahaḥ // VamP_29.42 //
GP12vamp__u:3616: sa tatra dṛṣṭvā tāṃ durgāṃ bhrāntadṛṣṭiruvāca ha /
GP12vamp__u:3620: preṣito 'sīha śumbhena balānnetuṃ hi māṃ kila /
GP12vamp__u:3621: tatra kiṃ hyabalā kuryād yathecchasi tathā kuru // VamP_29.45 //
GP12vamp__u:3628: sabalaṃ bhasmasānnītaṃ kauśikyā vīkṣya dānavam // VamP_29.48 //
GP12vamp__u:3631: ruruṃ ca balināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tathā jagmurmudānvitāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3642: tāvāpatantau raudrau vai dṛṣṭvā krodhapariplutā // VamP_29.55 //
GP12vamp__u:3645: kālī karālavadanā niḥsṛtā yoginī śubā // VamP_29.56 //
GP12vamp__u:3648: kāṃścit khaḍgena ciccheda khaṭvāṅgena parān raṇe /
GP12vamp__u:3649: nyaṣūdayad bhṛśaṃ kruddhā saratāśvagajān ripūn // VamP_29.58 //
GP12vamp__u:3651: kuñjaraṃ saha yantreṇa pratikṣepa muke 'mbikā // VamP_29.59 //
GP12vamp__u:3653: samaṃ yodhena vadane kṣipya carvayate 'mbikā // VamP_29.60 //
GP12vamp__u:3656: tatastu tad balaṃ devyā bhakṣitaṃ sabalādhipam /
GP12vamp__u:3657: rururdṛṣṭvā pradudrāva taṃ caṇḍi dadṛśe svayam // VamP_29.62 //
GP12vamp__u:3659: sa papāta hato bhūmyāṃ chinnamūla iva drumaḥ // VamP_29.63 //
GP12vamp__u:3662: sā ca kośaṃ samādāya vabandha vimalā jaṭāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:3663: ekā na bandhamagamat tāmutpāṭyākṣipad bhuvi // VamP_29.65 //
GP12vamp__u:3665: kuṣṇārdhamardhaśuklaṃ ca dhārayantī svakaṃ vapuḥ // VamP_29.66 //
GP12vamp__u:3667: tasyā nāma tadā cakre caṇḍamārīti viśrutam // VamP_29.67 //

GP12vamp__u:3891: hiraṇyaretā lokeṣu tena gītaśca pāvakaḥ // VamP_31.10 //

GP12vamp__u:3895: dṛṣṭvā papraccha genāyaṃ tava garbhaḥ samāhitaḥ // VamP_31.12 //

GP12vamp__u:3906: sā tu saṃtyajya taṃ bālaṃ brahmāṇaṃ sahasāgamat /

GP12vamp__u:3915: dadṛśuḥ svecchayā yāntyo bālaṃ śaravaṇe sthitam // VamP_31.22 //
GP12vamp__u:3917: ahaṃ pūrvamahaṃ pūrvaṃ tasmai stanye 'bhicukruśuḥ // VamP_31.23 //
GP12vamp__u:3918: vivadantīḥ sa tā dṛṣṭāvā ṣaṇmukhaḥ samajāyata /
GP12vamp__u:3919: abībharaṃśca tāḥ sarvāḥ śiśuṃ snehācca kṛttikāḥ // VamP_31.24 //
GP12vamp__u:3921: kārttikeyeti vikhyāto jātaḥ sa balināṃ varaḥ // VamP_31.25 //
GP12vamp__u:3923: kiyatpramāṇaḥ putraste varttate sāmprataṃ guhaḥ // VamP_31.26 //

GP12vamp__u:3926: taṃ prāha bhagavān yattu tejaḥ pītaṃ purā tvayā /
GP12vamp__u:3927: traiyambalaṃ trilokeśa jātaḥ śaravaṇe śiśuḥ // VamP_31.28 //
GP12vamp__u:3929: veginaṃ meṣamāruhya kuṭilā taṃ dadarśa ha // VamP_31.29 //
GP12vamp__u:3930: tataḥ papraccha kuṭilā śīghraṃ kva vrajase kave /
GP12vamp__u:3931: so 'bravīt putraduṣṭyarthaṃ jātaṃ śaravaṇe śiśum // VamP_31.30 //
GP12vamp__u:3932: sābravīt tanayo mahyaṃ mametyāha ca pāvakaḥ /

GP12vamp__u:3942: tato 'mbikā prāha haraṃ deva gacchāma śiśum /
GP12vamp__u:3943: praṣṭuṃ samāśrayed yaṃ sa tasya putro bhaviṣyati // VamP_31.36 //
GP12vamp__u:3945: sahomayā kuṭilayā pāvakena ca dhīmatā // VamP_31.37 //
GP12vamp__u:3947: dadṛśuḥ śiśukaṃ taṃ ca kṛttikotsaṅgaśāyinam // VamP_31.38 //
GP12vamp__u:3949: yogī caturmūrtirabhūt ṣaṇmukhaḥ sa śiśustvapi // VamP_31.39 //
GP12vamp__u:3952: tataḥ prītiyuto rudra umā ca kuṭilā tathā /
GP12vamp__u:3953: pāvakaścāpi deveśaḥ parāṃ mudamavāpa ca // VamP_31.41 //
GP12vamp__u:3955: tā abravīddharaḥ pratītyā vidhivad vacanaṃ mune // VamP_31.42 //
GP12vamp__u:3956: nāmnā tu kārttikeyo hi yuṣmākaṃ tanayastvasau /
GP12vamp__u:3959: guha ityeva nāmnā ca mamāsau tanayaḥ smṛtaḥ // VamP_31.44 //
GP12vamp__u:3960: māhāsena iti khyāto hutāśasyāstu putrakaḥ śāradvata iti khyātaḥ sutaḥ śaravaṇasya ca // VamP_31.45 //

GP12vamp__u:3969: devakāryaṃ tvayā deva kṛtaṃ devyāgninā tathā // VamP_31.50 //
GP12vamp__u:3973: mahiṣaṃ ghātayatveṣa tārakaṃ ca sudāruṇam // VamP_31.52 //
GP12vamp__u:3982: abhiṣiktaṃ kumāraṃ ca giriputrī nirīkṣya hi /
GP12vamp__u:3986: tadābhiṣiktaṃ tanayaṃ dṛṣṭvā śarvo mudaṃ yayau /
GP12vamp__u:3987: pāvakaḥ kṛttikāścaiva kuṭilā ca yaśasvinī // VamP_31.59 //
GP12vamp__u:3991: caturthaṃ balināṃ mukhyaṃ khyātaṃ kumudamālinam // VamP_31.61 //
GP12vamp__u:3992: haradattān gaṇān dṛṣṭvā devāḥ skandasya nārada /
GP12vamp__u:3993: pradaduḥ pramathān svān svān sarve brahmapurogamāḥ // VamP_31.62 //
GP12vamp__u:3994: sthāṇuṃ brahma gaṇaṃ prādād viṣṇuḥ prādād gaṇatrayam /

GP12vamp__u:4765: tamāgataṃ prāha mune madhughnaḥ prāpto 'si kenāsura kāraṇena /

GP12vamp__u:4767: yadīha māṃ yoddhumupāgato 'si tat kampeta te hṛdayaṃ kimartham /
GP12vamp__u:4768: jvarāturasyeva muhurmuhurvai tannāsmi yotsye saha kātareṇa / /
GP12vamp__u:4769: 35.74 ityevamukto madhusūdanena murustadā sve hṛdaye svahastam /
GP12vamp__u:4770: kathaṃ kva kasyeti muhustathoktvā nipātayāmāsa vipannabuddhiḥ // VamP_35.75 //
GP12vamp__u:4771: hariśca cakraṃ mṛdulāghavena mumoca taddhatakamalasya śatroḥ /
GP12vamp__u:4772: ciccheda devāstu gatavyathābhavan devaṃ prasaṃsanti ca padmanābham // VamP_35.76 //
GP12vamp__u:4773: etat tavoktaṃ muradaityanāśanaṃ kṛtaṃ hi yuktyā śitacakrapāṇinā /
GP12vamp__u:4774: ataḥ prasiddhiṃ samupājagāma murārirityeva vibhurnṛsiṃhaḥ // VamP_35.77 //
GP12vamp__u:4781: sa tavtsyati mahājñānī jagatkṣubdhaṃ caracaram // VamP_36.2 //
GP12vamp__u:4784: na tatra devaṃ na vṛṣaṃ na devīṃ na ca nandinam // VamP_36.3 //
GP12vamp__u:4786: tān mūḍhadṛṣṭīn saṃprokṣya devān viṣṇurmahādyutiḥ // VamP_36.4 //
GP12vamp__u:4787: provāca kiṃ na paśyadhvaṃ maheśaṃ purataḥ sthitam /
GP12vamp__u:4789: na vidmaḥ kāraṇaṃ tacca yena dṛṣṭirhatā hi naḥ /
GP12vamp__u:4792: tena jñānaviveko vai hṛto devevana śūlinā // VamP_36.7 //
GP12vamp__u:4796: kṣīrasnāne prayuñjīta sārddha kumbhaśataṃ surāḥ // VamP_36.9 //
GP12vamp__u:4798: pañcagavyasya śuddhasya kumbhāḥ ṣoḍaśa kīrtitāḥ // VamP_36.10 //
GP12vamp__u:4799: maduno 'ṣṭau jalasyoktāḥ sarve te dviguṇāḥ surāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:4804: aguruṃ saha kāleyaṃ candanenāpi dhūpayet // VamP_36.13 //
GP12vamp__u:4806: evaṃ kṛte tu deveśaṃ paśyadhvaṃ netareṇa ca // VamP_36.14 //
GP12vamp__u:4813: palā dvādaśa toyasya palāṣṭau payasaḥ surāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:4814: ṣaṭpalaṃ sarpiṣaḥ proktaṃ divase divase pibet // VamP_36.17 //
GP12vamp__u:4823: maddehe kiṃ na paśyadhvaṃ yogāścāyaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // VamP_36.21 //
GP12vamp__u:4825: satyaṃ vada sureśāna maheśānaḥ kva tiṣṭhati // VamP_36.22 //
GP12vamp__u:4842: dṛṣṭvaiva devā hariśaṅkaraṃ taṃ namo 'stu te sarvagatāvyayeti /
GP12vamp__u:4843: proktvā praṇāmaṃ kamalāsanādyāścakrurmatiṃ caikatarāṃ niyujya // VamP_36.31 //
GP12vamp__u:4851: śrutvottasthau ca vaigena sarvavyāpī nirañjanaḥ // VamP_36.35 //
GP12vamp__u:4853: sa cāgataḥ suraiḥ sendraḥ praṇato vinayānvitaiḥ // VamP_36.36 //
GP12vamp__u:4857: tataḥ surā divaṃ jagmurhṛṣṭāḥ prayatamānasāḥ // VamP_36.38 //
GP12vamp__u:4863: jagatkṣobhakaraṃ vipra tacchīghraṃ kathyatāṃ mama // VamP_36.41 //
GP12vamp__u:4866: saṃjīvanīṃ śubhāṃ vidyāṃ jñātumicche trilocana // VamP_36.42 //
GP12vamp__u:4869: tasmāt saṃjīvanīṃvidyāṃ bhavān jñāsyati tattavattaḥ // VamP_36.43 //
GP12vamp__u:4873: dadarśa nṛtyamānaṃ ca ṛṣiṃ maṅkaṇasaṃjñitam // VamP_36.45 //
GP12vamp__u:4874: bhāvena poplūyati bālavat sa bhujau prasāryaiva nanartta vegāt /
GP12vamp__u:4875: tasyaiva vegena samāhatā tu cacāla bhūrbhūmidharaiḥ sahaiva // VamP_36.46 //
GP12vamp__u:4876: taṃ śaṅgaro 'bhyetya kare nigṛhya provāca vākyaṃ prahasan maharṣe /
GP12vamp__u:4877: kiṃ bhāvito nṛtyasi kena hetunā vadasva māmetya kimatra tuṣṭiḥ // VamP_36.47 //
GP12vamp__u:4878: sa brāhmaṇaḥ prāha mamādya tuṣṭiryeneha jātā śṛṇu tad dvijendra /
GP12vamp__u:4879: bahūn gaṇān vai mama tapyatastapaḥ saṃvatsarān kāyaviśoṣaṇārtham // VamP_36.48 //
GP12vamp__u:4880: tato 'nupaśyāmi karāt kṣatotthaṃ nirgacchate śākarasaṃ mameha /
GP12vamp__u:4881: tenādya tuṣṭo 'smi bhṛśaṃ dvijendra yenāsmi nṛtyāmi subhāvitātmā // VamP_36.49 //
GP12vamp__u:4882: taṃ prāha śaṃbhurdvija paśya mahyaṃ bhasma pravṛtto 'ṅgulito 'tiśuklam /
GP12vamp__u:4883: saṃtāḍanādeva na ca praharṣo mamāsti nṛnaṃ hi bhavān pramattaḥ // VamP_36.50 //
GP12vamp__u:4884: śrutvātha vākyaṃ vṛṣabhadhvajasya matvā munirmaṅkaṇako maharṣe /
GP12vamp__u:4885: nṛtyaṃ parityajya suvismito 'tha vavanda pādau vinayāvanamraḥ // VamP_36.51 //
GP12vamp__u:4886: tamāha śaṃbhurdvija gaccha lokaṃ taṃ brahmaṇo durgamamavyayasya /
GP12vamp__u:4887: idaṃ ca tīrthaṃ pravaraṃ pṛthivyāṃ pṛthūdakasyāstu samaṃ phalena // VamP_36.52 //
GP12vamp__u:4889: sadāstu dharmasya nidhānamagryaṃ sārasvataṃ pāpamalāpahāri // VamP_36.53 //
GP12vamp__u:4891: manoharā caughavatī viśālā ca sarasvatī // VamP_36.54 //
GP12vamp__u:4897: mūrtti sthāpya kurukṣetre brahmalokamagād vaśī // VamP_36.57 //
GP12vamp__u:4900: etat tavoktaṃ dvija śaṅkarastu gatastadāsīt tapase 'tha śaile /
GP12vamp__u:4901: śūnye 'bhyagād dṛṣṭamatirhi devyā saṃyodhito yena hi kāraṇena // VamP_36.59 //
GP12vamp__u:4910: sa me suhṛtsa me bandhuḥ sa bhrāta sa pitā mama /
GP12vamp__u:4914: yeyaṃ girisutā vīra sā mātā dharmatastava /
GP12vamp__u:4915: pitā trinayano devaḥ śrūyatāmatra kāraṇam // VamP_37.5 //
GP12vamp__u:4917: ārādhito mahādevaḥ putrārthāya purā kila // VamP_37.6 //
GP12vamp__u:4919: putrakaḥ putrakāmāsya proktvetyaṃ vacanaṃ vibho // VamP_37.7 //
GP12vamp__u:4924: yadā tu lokavidviṣṭaṃ duṣṭaṃ karma kariṣyati /
GP12vamp__u:4926: ghātayiṣyati vā vipraṃ yadā prakṣipta cāsurān /
GP12vamp__u:4931: sarvasyāpīha jagato guruḥ śaṃbhuḥ pitā dhruvam // VamP_37.13 //
GP12vamp__u:4933: nedṛśe pāpasaṃkalpe matiṃ kuryād bhavadvidhaḥ // VamP_37.14 //
GP12vamp__u:4936: na cāpi śaktaḥ prāptuṃ tāṃ bhavāñśailanṛpātmajām /
GP12vamp__u:4937: ajitvā sagaṇaṃ rudraṃ sa ca kāmo 'dya durlabhaḥ // VamP_37.16 //
GP12vamp__u:4938: yastaret sāgaraṃ dorbhyā pātayed bhuvi bhāskaram /
GP12vamp__u:4941: na ca śakyo haro jetuṃ satyaṃ satyaṃ mayoditam // VamP_37.18 //
GP12vamp__u:4942: kiṃ tvayā na śrutaṃ daitya yathā daṇḍo mahīpaliḥ /
GP12vamp__u:4945: sa ca vavre mahātejāḥ paurohityāya bhārgavam // VamP_37.20 //
GP12vamp__u:4947: sukrasyāsīcca duhitā arajā nāma nāmataḥ // VamP_37.21 //
GP12vamp__u:4952: sa papraccha kva śukroti tamūcuḥ paricārikāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:4953: gataḥ sa bhagavān śukro yājanāya danoḥ sutam // VamP_37.24 //
GP12vamp__u:4954: papraccha nṛpatiḥ kā tu tiṣṭhate bhārgavāśrame /
GP12vamp__u:4961: śukraśiṣyānapi balī ekākī nṛpa āvrajat // VamP_37.28 //
GP12vamp__u:4966: sāpi prāha nṛpaśreṣṭha mā vinīnasa āturaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:4967: pitā mama mahākrodhāt tridaśānapi nirdahet // VamP_37.31 //
GP12vamp__u:4970: so 'brovīd bhīru māṃ śukraḥ kālena paridhakṣyati /
GP12vamp__u:4972: sā prāha daṇḍaṃ nṛpātiṃ muhūrta paripālaya /
GP12vamp__u:4973: tameva yācasva guruṃ sa te dāsyatyasaṃśayam // VamP_37.34 //
GP12vamp__u:4974: daṇḍo 'bravīt sutanvaṅgi kālakṣepo na me kṣamaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:4977: dātuṃ śaktā svamātmānaṃ svatantrā na hi yoṣitaḥ // VamP_37.36 //
GP12vamp__u:4978: kiṃ vā te bahunoktena mā tvaṃ nāśaṃ narādhipa /
GP12vamp__u:4981: citrāṅgadāyā yad vṛttaṃ purā devayuge śubhe // VamP_37.38 //
GP12vamp__u:4985: jagāma nemiṣaṃ nāma snātuṃ kamalalocanā // VamP_37.40 //
GP12vamp__u:4989: tāṃ dadarśa ca tanvaṅgīṃ śubhāṅgo madanāturaḥ // VamP_37.41 //
GP12vamp__u:4990: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sā sakhīrāha vacanaṃ satyasaṃyutam /
GP12vamp__u:4992: madarthe ca kṣamaṃ me 'sya svapradānaṃ surūpiṇaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:4993: sakhyastāmabruvan bālā na pragalbha'si sundari // VamP_37.43 //
GP12vamp__u:4996: na te yuktamihātmānaṃ dātuṃ narapateḥ svayam /
GP12vamp__u:4997: etasminnantare rājā surathaḥ satyavāt sudhī // VamP_37.45 //
GP12vamp__u:4999: tvaṃ mugdhe mohayasi māṃ dṛṣṭyaiva madirekṣaṇe // VamP_37.46 //
GP12vamp__u:5003: tataḥ sā cārusarvāṅgī rājño rājīvalocanā // VamP_37.48 //
GP12vamp__u:5005: evaṃ purā tayā tainvyā paritrātaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ // VamP_37.49 //
GP12vamp__u:5007: arajaskābravīd daṇḍaṃ tasyā yad vṛttamuttaram // VamP_37.50 //
GP12vamp__u:5008: kiṃ tvayā na pirajñātaṃ tasmāt te kathayāmyaham /
GP12vamp__u:5009: tadā tayā tu tanvaṅgyā surathasya mahīpateḥ // VamP_37.51 //
GP12vamp__u:5011: yasmād dharmaṃ parityajya strībhāvān mandacetase // VamP_37.52 //
GP12vamp__u:5013: vivāharahitā naiva sukhaṃ lapsyasi bhartṛtaḥ // VamP_37.53 //
GP12vamp__u:5014: na ca putraphalaṃ naiva patinā yogameṣyasi /
GP12vamp__u:5019: tatastāṃ siṣicuḥ sakhyaḥ sarasvatyā jalena hi /
GP12vamp__u:5022: tāṃ mṛtāmiti vijñāya jagmuḥ sakhyastvarānvitāḥ // VamP_37.57 //
GP12vamp__u:5024: sā ca tāsvapi sarvāsu gatāsu vanamuttamam // VamP_37.58 //
GP12vamp__u:5026: apaśyantī nāpatiṃ tathā snigdhaṃ sakhījanam // VamP_37.59 //
GP12vamp__u:5028: tāṃ vegāt kāñcanākṣī tu mahānadyāṃ nareśvara // VamP_37.60 //
GP12vamp__u:5030: tayāpi tasyāstadbhāvyaṃ viditvātha viśāṃ pate // VamP_37.61 //
GP12vamp__u:5032: evaṃ tasyāḥ svatantrāyā eṣāvasthā śrutā mayā // VamP_37.62 //
GP12vamp__u:5033: tāṃ prāha putri kasyāsi sutā surasutopamā /
GP12vamp__u:5035: tataḥ sā prāha tamṛṣiṃ yathātathyaṃ kṛśodarī /
GP12vamp__u:5038: yojitā naiva patinā tasmācchākhāmṛgo 'stu saḥ // VamP_37.65 //
GP12vamp__u:5039: ityuktvā sa mahāyogī bhūyaḥ snātvā vidhānataḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5040: upāsya paśvimāṃ sandhyāṃ pūjayāmāsa śaṅkaram // VamP_37.66 //
GP12vamp__u:5045: tatra sthitāyā rambhoru khyātā devavatī śubhā /
GP12vamp__u:5058: na so 'sti kaścit tridaśo 'suro vā yakṣo 'tha martyo rajanīcaro vā /
GP12vamp__u:5059: idaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ mṛgaśāvanetryā nirmārjayed yaḥ svaparākrameṇa // VamP_37.75 //
GP12vamp__u:5060: ityevamuktvā sa munirjagāma draṣṭuṃ vibhuṃ puṣkaranāthamīḍyam /
GP12vamp__u:5061: nadīṃ payoṣṇīṃ munivṛndavandyāṃ saṃcintayanneva viśālanetrām // VamP_37.76 //
GP12vamp__u:5066: smarantyāḥ surathaṃ vīraṃ mahān kālaḥ samabhyagāt // VamP_38.1 //
GP12vamp__u:5075: tāṃ ca tad vanamāyāntīṃ samaṃ pitrā varānanām /
GP12vamp__u:5076: dadarśa vānaraśreṣṭhaḥ prajagrāha bālat kare // VamP_38.6 //
GP12vamp__u:5077: tato gṛhītāṃ kapinā sa daityaḥ svasutāṃ śube /
GP12vamp__u:5078: kandaro vīkṣya saṃkruddhaḥ khḍgamudyamya cādravat // VamP_38.7 //
GP12vamp__u:5083: tasmin mahāśrame puṇye sthāpya devavatīṃ kapiḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5084: nyamañjata sa kālindyāṃ paśyato dānavasya hi // VamP_38.10 //
GP12vamp__u:5085: so 'jānat tāṃ mṛtāṃ putrīṃ samaṃ śākhāmṛgeṇa hi /
GP12vamp__u:5086: jagāma ca mahātejāḥ pātālaṃ nilayaṃ nijam // VamP_38.11 //
GP12vamp__u:5087: sa cāpi vānaro devyā kālindyā vegate hṛtaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5088: nītaḥ śivīti vikhyāte deśaṃ śubhajanāvṛtam // VamP_38.12 //
GP12vamp__u:5089: tatastīrtvātha vegena sa kapiḥ parvataṃ prati /
GP12vamp__u:5090: gantukāmo mahātejā yatra nyastā sulocanā // VamP_38.13 //
GP12vamp__u:5092: nandayantyā samaṃ putryā gatvā jigamiṣuḥ kapiḥ // VamP_38.14 //
GP12vamp__u:5093: tāṃ dṛṣṭvāmanyata śrīmān seyaṃ devavatī dhruvam /
GP12vamp__u:5094: tanme vṛthā śramo jāto jalamajjanasaṃbhavaḥ // VamP_38.15 //
GP12vamp__u:5096: sā tad bhayācca nyapatannadīṃ caiva hiraṇvatīm // VamP_38.16 //
GP12vamp__u:5100: samāste vai mahātejāḥ saṃvatsaragaṇān bahūn // VamP_38.18 //
GP12vamp__u:5102: nītā deśaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ kośalaṃ sādhubhuryutam // VamP_38.19 //
GP12vamp__u:5103: gacchantī sā ca rudatī dadṛśo vaṭapādapam /
GP12vamp__u:5106: upaviṣṭā śilavāpaṭṭe tato vācaṃ praśuśrave // VamP_38.21 //
GP12vamp__u:5107: na so 'sti puruṣaḥ kaścid yastaṃ brūyāt tapodhanam /
GP12vamp__u:5109: sā śrutvā tāṃ tadā vārṇīṃ vispaṣṭākṣarasaṃyutām /
GP12vamp__u:5115: prāha kenāsi baddhastvaṃ pāpinā vada bālaka // VamP_38.25 //
GP12vamp__u:5116: sa tāmāha mahābhāge baddho 'smi kapinā vaṭe /
GP12vamp__u:5117: jaṭāsvevaṃ suduṣṭena jīvāmi tapaso balāt // VamP_38.26 //
GP12vamp__u:5119: tatrāsti tapaso rāśiḥ pitā mama ṛtadhvajaḥ // VamP_38.27 //
GP12vamp__u:5122: tato māmabravīt tāto nāma kṛtvā śubhānane /
GP12vamp__u:5127: pañcavarṣaśatān bālo bhokṣyase bandhanaṃ dṛḍham // VamP_38.31 //
GP12vamp__u:5133: vicarāmi mahīpṛṣṭhaṃ gacchan snātuṃ hiraṇvatīm // VamP_38.34 //
GP12vamp__u:5135: imāṃ devavatīṃ gṛhyaṃ mūḍha nyastāṃ mahāśrame // VamP_38.35 //
GP12vamp__u:5138: tathā ca rakṣā kapinā kṛtā bhīru nirantaraiḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5141: diśāṃ mukeṣu sarveṣu kṛtaṃ yantraṃ latāmayam // VamP_38.38 //
GP12vamp__u:5143: yathecchayā mayā dṛṣṭametat te gaditaṃ śubhe // VamP_38.39 //
GP12vamp__u:5145: samāyātā sucārvaṅgī kena sārthena māṃ vada // VamP_38.40 //
GP12vamp__u:5148: tatra me jātake proktamṛṣiṇā mudgalena hi /
GP12vamp__u:5149: iyaṃ narendramahiṣī bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // VamP_38.42 //
GP12vamp__u:5154: tato jagāma sa ṛṣirevamuktvā vaco 'dbhutam // VamP_38.44 //
GP12vamp__u:5157: tad bhayācca mayā hyātmā kṣiptaḥ sāgaragājale /
GP12vamp__u:5159: śrutvā jābāliratha tad vacanaṃ vai tayoditam /
GP12vamp__u:5160: prāha sundari gacchasva śrīkaṇṭhaṃ yamunātaṭe // VamP_38.47 //
GP12vamp__u:5169: teṣāmarthaṃ hi vijñāya sā tadā cāruhāsinī /
GP12vamp__u:5172: sā cāvasthāmimāṃ prāptā kaścinmāṃ trātumīśvaraḥ // VamP_38.53 //
GP12vamp__u:5176: ityevaṃ cintayantī sā saṃpraviṣṭā mahāśramam // VamP_38.55 //
GP12vamp__u:5177: tato dadarśa devābhāṃ sthitāṃ devavatīṃ śubhām /
GP12vamp__u:5187: sa dṛṣṭvā vācayitvā ca tamarthamadhigamya ca /
GP12vamp__u:5189: tataḥ saṃpūjya deveśaṃ tvarayā sa ṛtadhvajaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5194: udbddhaḥ kapinā rājan viṣayānate tavaiva hi // VamP_38.64 //
GP12vamp__u:5198: ādideśa priyaṃ putraṃ śakuniṃ tāpasānvaye // VamP_38.66 //
GP12vamp__u:5199: tataḥ sa prahitaḥ pitrā bhrātā mama mahābhujaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5200: saṃprāpto bandhanoddeśaṃ samaṃ hi paramarṣiṇā // VamP_38.67 //
GP12vamp__u:5204: dṛṣṭvā sa muniputraṃ taṃ svajaṭāsaṃyataṃ vaṭe // VamP_38.69 //
GP12vamp__u:5207: kapinā yat kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ latāpāśaṃ caturdiśam /
GP12vamp__u:5208: pañcavarṣaśate kāle gate śaktastadā śaraiḥ // VamP_38.71 //
GP12vamp__u:5210: prāptaṃ svapitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā jābāliḥ saṃyato 'pi san // VamP_38.72 //
GP12vamp__u:5212: saṃpariṣvajya sa munirmūrdhnyāghrāya sutaṃ tataḥ // VamP_38.73 //
GP12vamp__u:5215: āruroha vaṭaṃ tūrṇaṃ jaṭā mocayituṃ tadā /
GP12vamp__u:5216: na ca śaknoti saṃcchannaṃ dṛḍhaṃ kapivarema hi // VamP_38.75 //
GP12vamp__u:5217: yadā na śakitā stena saṃpramocayituṃ jaṭāḥ /

GP12vamp__u:5663: bhavān dharmaparastveko nāhaṃ dharma samācare // VamP_40.41 //
GP12vamp__u:5665: gaccha śambara śailendraṃ mandaraṃ vada śaṅkaram // VamP_40.42 //
GP12vamp__u:5667: paribhuñjasi kenādya tava datto vadasva māma // VamP_40.43 //
GP12vamp__u:5669: tat kimarthaṃ nivasase māmanādṛtya mandare // VamP_40.44 //
GP12vamp__u:5671: yeyaṃ hi bhavataḥ patnī sā me śīghraṃ pradīyatām // VamP_40.45 //
GP12vamp__u:5672: ityuktaḥ sa tadā tena śambaro mandaraṃ drutam /
GP12vamp__u:5673: jagāma tatra yatrāste saha devyā pinākadhṛk // VamP_40.46 //
GP12vamp__u:5675: tamuttaraṃ haraḥ prāha śṛṇvatyā girikanyayā // VamP_40.47 //
GP12vamp__u:5677: tanna śaknomyahaṃ tyaktuṃ vinājñāṃ vṛkṣavairiṇaḥ // VamP_40.48 //
GP12vamp__u:5679: tadeṣā yātu svaṃ kāmaṃ nāhaṃ vārayituṃ kṣamaḥ // VamP_40.49 //
GP12vamp__u:5681: brūhi gatvāndhakaṃ vīra mama vākyaṃ vipaścitam // VamP_40.50 //
GP12vamp__u:5683: prāmadyūtaṃ paristīrya yo jeṣyati sa lapsyate // VamP_40.51 //
GP12vamp__u:5688: gaccha śīghraṃ mahābāho bherīṃ sānnāhikīṃ dṛḍhām /
GP12vamp__u:5692: sā tāḍitā balavatā bherī duryodhanena hi /
GP12vamp__u:5693: satvaraṃ bhairavaṃ rāvaṃ rurāva surabhī yathā // VamP_40.56 //
GP12vamp__u:5695: samāyātāḥ sabhāṃ tūrṇaṃ kimetaditi vādinaḥ // VamP_40.57 //
GP12vamp__u:5697: te cāpi balināṃ śreṣṭhāḥ sannaddhā yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // VamP_40.58 //
GP12vamp__u:5701: jambhaḥ kujambho huṇḍaśca tuhuṇḍaḥ śambaro baliḥ // VamP_40.60 //
GP12vamp__u:5703: ayaḥśuṅkuḥ śibiḥ śālvo vṛṣaparvā virocanaḥ // VamP_40.61 //
GP12vamp__u:5707: ete cānye ca bahavo mahāvīryā mahābalāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5710: mahācalaṃ mandaramabhyupeyivān sa kālapāśāvasito hi mandadhīḥ // VamP_40.64 //
GP12vamp__u:5715: prāhāmantraya śailāde ye sthitāstava śāsane // VamP_41.1 //
GP12vamp__u:5717: upaspṛśya jalaṃ śrīmān sasmāra gaṇanāyakān // VamP_41.2 //
GP12vamp__u:5724: ete rudrā iti khyātāḥ koṭya ekādaśaiva tu // VamP_41.5 //
GP12vamp__u:5728: ṣaṭ ca ṣaṣṭistathā koṭyaḥ skandanāmnaḥ kumārakān // VamP_41.7 //
GP12vamp__u:5732: ekaikaṃ prati deveśa tāvatyo hyapi mātaraḥ // VamP_41.9 //
GP12vamp__u:5734: ete śaivā iti proktāstava bhaktā gaṇeśvarāḥ // VamP_41.10 //
GP12vamp__u:5740: ime prāptā gaṇā yoddhuṃ mahāvratina uttamāḥ // VamP_41.13 //
GP12vamp__u:5742: nirāśrayā nāma gaṇāḥ samāyātā jagadguro // VamP_41.14 //
GP12vamp__u:5746: bhairavo viṣṇunā sārddhamabhedenārcito hi yai // VamP_41.16 //
GP12vamp__u:5749: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5755: tatastadadbhutatamaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve gaṇeśvarāḥ suciraṃ vismitākṣāśca vailakṣyamagamat param // VamP_41.21 //
GP12vamp__u:5757: prāha prahasya deveśaṃ śūlapāṇiṃ gaṇādhipam // VamP_41.22 //
GP12vamp__u:5758: vismitāmī gaṇā deva sarva eva maheśvara /
GP12vamp__u:5759: mahāpāśupatānāṃ hi yat tvayāliṅganaṃ kṛtam // VamP_41.23 //
GP12vamp__u:5761: rūpaṃ jñānaṃ vivekaṃ ca vadasva svecchayā vibho // VamP_41.24 //
GP12vamp__u:5763: babhāṣe tān gaṇān sarvān bhāvābhāvavicāriṇaḥ // VamP_41.25 //
GP12vamp__u:5768: yo 'haṃ sa bhagavān viṣṇurviṣṇuryaḥ so 'hamavyayaḥ // VamP_41.27 //
GP12vamp__u:5771: yathāhaṃ vai parijñāto na bhavadbhistathā dhruvam /
GP12vamp__u:5773: tena jñānaṃ hi vai naṣṭaṃ nātastvāliṅgitā mayā /
GP12vamp__u:5776: bhavān hi nirmalaḥ suddhaḥ śāntaḥ suklo nirañjanaḥ // VamP_41.31 //
GP12vamp__u:5781: na tveva yogyā yūyaṃ hi mahājñānasya karhicit /
GP12vamp__u:5782: apavādabhayād guhyaṃ bhavatāṃ hi prakāśaye // VamP_41.34 //
GP12vamp__u:5792: ator'thaṃ na kṣipāmyadya bhavato narake 'dbhute // VamP_41.39 //
GP12vamp__u:5794: sa caiva sadṛśo loke vidyate sacarācare /
GP12vamp__u:5795: śvetamūrtiḥ sa gavān pīto rakto 'ñjanaprabhaḥ // VamP_41.40 //
GP12vamp__u:5796: na tasya sadṛśo loke vidyate sacarācare /
GP12vamp__u:5797: śvetamūrtiḥ sa bhagavān pīto rakto 'ñjanaprabhaḥ // VamP_41.41 //
GP12vamp__u:5798: tasmāt parataraṃ loke nānyad dharma hi vidyate /
GP12vamp__u:5799: sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ caiva tāmasaṃ miśrakaṃ tathā /
GP12vamp__u:5800: sa eva dhatte bhagavān sarvapūjyaḥ sadāśivaḥ // VamP_41.42 //
GP12vamp__u:5805: tataḥ paśyanti hi gaṇāḥ tamīsaṃ vai śahasraśaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5809: tata ekamukhaṃ bhūyo dadṛśuḥ śaṅkaraṃ gaṇāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5810: raudraiśca vaiṣṇavaiścaiva vṛtaṃ cihnaiḥ sahasraśaḥ // VamP_41.47 //
GP12vamp__u:5813: yathā yathā trinayano rūpaṃ dhatte guṇāgraṇīḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5814: tathā tathā tvajāyanta mahāpāśupatā gaṇāḥ // VamP_41.49 //
GP12vamp__u:5817: kṣaṇācchvetaḥ kṣaṇād raktaḥ pīto nīlaḥ kṣaṇādapi // VamP_41.50 //
GP12vamp__u:5819: kṣaṇād bhavati rudrendraḥ kṣaṇācchaṃbhuḥ prabhākaraḥ // VamP_41.51 //
GP12vamp__u:5827: parituṣṭo 'smi vaḥ sarve jñānenānena suvratāḥ // VamP_41.55 //
GP12vamp__u:5830: bhinnadṛṣṭyudbhavaṃ pāpaṃ yattad bhraṃśaṃ prayātu naḥ // VamP_41.56 //
GP12vamp__u:5837: nīlājinātatatanuḥ śaradabhravarṇo yadvad vibhāti balavān vṛṣabho harasya // VamP_41.59 //
GP12vamp__u:5848: mandaraṃ parvataśreṣṭhaṃ dadṛśe pitaraṃ tathā // VamP_42.4 //
GP12vamp__u:5850: kiṃ tiṣṭhasi jagannātha samuttiṣṭha raṇotsukaḥ // VamP_42.5 //
GP12vamp__u:5853: tato girisutā devaṃ samāliṅgya punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5854: samīkṣya sasnehaharaṃ prāha gaccha jayāndhakam // VamP_42.7 //
GP12vamp__u:5857: tato haraḥ prāha vaco yaśasyaṃ mālinīmapi /
GP12vamp__u:5858: jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ caiva jayantīṃ cāparājitām // VamP_42.9 //
GP12vamp__u:5861: iti saṃdiśya tāḥ sarvāḥ samāruhya vṛṣaṃ vibhuḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5862: nirjagāma gṛhāt tuṣṭo jayepsuḥ śūladhṛg balī // VamP_42.11 //
GP12vamp__u:5865: raṇāya nirgacchati lokapāle maheśvare śūladhare maharṣe /
GP12vamp__u:5866: śubhāni saumyāni sumaṅgalāni jātānī cihnāni jayāya śaṃbhoḥ // VamP_42.13 //
GP12vamp__u:5867: śivā sthitā vāmatare 'tha bhāge prayāti cāgre svanamunnadantī /
GP12vamp__u:5868: kravyādasaṃghāś ca tathāmiṣaiṇaḥ prayānti hṛṣṭāstṛṣitāsṛgarthe // VamP_42.14 //
GP12vamp__u:5870: śakuniś cāpi hārīto maunī yāti parāṅgamukhaḥ // VamP_42.15 //
GP12vamp__u:5872: śailādiṃ prāha vacanaṃ sasmitaṃ śaśiśekharaḥ // VamP_42.16 //
GP12vamp__u:5874: nandin jajo 'dya me bhāvī na kathañcit parājayaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5877: kaḥ saṃdeho mahādeva yat tvaṃ jayasi śātravān // VamP_42.18 //
GP12vamp__u:5889: gaṇāstaddānavaṃ sainyaṃ jighāṃsanti sma kopitāḥ // VamP_42.24 //
GP12vamp__u:5894: taṃ bhrāmayāno balavān nijaghāna raṇe gaṇān /
GP12vamp__u:5901: śatadhā tvagamad brahman meroḥ kūṭa ivāśaniḥ // VamP_42.30 //
GP12vamp__u:5902: parighaṃ viphalaṃ dṛṣṭvā samāyāntaṃ ca pārṣadam /
GP12vamp__u:5903: babandha bāhupāśena rāhū rakṣan hi mātulam // VamP_42.31 //
GP12vamp__u:5906: kāṣṭhavat sa dvidhā bhūto nipapāta dharātale /
GP12vamp__u:5908: sa mokṣārthe 'karod yatnaṃ na śaśāka ca nārada // VamP_42.33 //
GP12vamp__u:5909: vināyakaṃ saṃyatamīkṣya rāhuṇā kuṇḍodaro nāma gaṇeśvaro 'tha /
GP12vamp__u:5910: pragṛhya tūrṇa muśalaṃ mahātmā rāhuṃ durātmānamasau jaghāna // VamP_42.34 //
GP12vamp__u:5911: tato gaṇeśaḥ kalaśadhvajastu prāsena rāhuṃ hṛdaye bibheda /
GP12vamp__u:5912: ghaṭodaro vai gadayā jaghāna khaḍgena rakṣo 'dhipatiḥ sukeśī // VamP_42.35 //
GP12vamp__u:5915: hate tuhuṇḍe vimukhe ca rāhau gaṇeśvarāḥ krodhaviṣaṃ mumukṣavaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5918: gadāṃ samāvidhya jaghāna mūrdhni vināyakaṃ kumbhataṭe kare ca // VamP_42.38 //
GP12vamp__u:5921: gaṇādhipāṃstān vimukhān sa kṛtvā balanvito vīrataro 'surendraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5922: samabhyadhāvat tvarito nihantuṃ gaṇeśvarān skandaviśākhamukhyān // VamP_42.40 //
GP12vamp__u:5923: tamāpatantaṃ bhagavān samīkṣya maheśvaraḥ śreṣṭhatamaṃ gaṇānām /
GP12vamp__u:5924: śailādimāmantrya vaco babhāṣe gacchasva daityān jahi vīra yuddha // VamP_42.41 //
GP12vamp__u:5926: baliṃ sambhyetya jaghāna mūrdhni saṃmohitaḥ so 'vanimāsasāda // VamP_42.42 //
GP12vamp__u:5927: saṃmohitaṃ bhrātṛsutaṃ viditvā balī kujambho musalaṃ pragṛhya /
GP12vamp__u:5928: saṃbhrāmayaṃstūrṇataraṃ sa vegāt sasarja nandiṃ prati jātakopaḥ // VamP_42.43 //
GP12vamp__u:5929: tamāpatantaṃ musalaṃ pragṛhya kareṇa tūrṇa bhagavān sa nandī /
GP12vamp__u:5930: jaghāna tenaiva kujambhamāhave sa prāṇahīno nipapāta bhūmau // VamP_42.44 //
GP12vamp__u:5931: hatvā kujambhaṃ musalena nandī vajreṇa vīraḥ śataśo jaghāna /
GP12vamp__u:5932: te vadhyamānā gaṇanāyakena duryodhanaṃ vai śaraṇaṃ prapannāḥ // VamP_42.45 //
GP12vamp__u:5934: prāsaṃ samāvidhya taḍitprakāśaṃ nandiṃ pracikṣepa hato 'si vai bruvan // VamP_42.46 //
GP12vamp__u:5935: tamāpatantaṃ kuliśena nandī bibheda guhyaṃ piśuno yathā naraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5936: tatprāsamālakṣya tadā nikṛttaṃ saṃvarttya muṣṭiṃ gaṇamāsasāda // VamP_42.47 //
GP12vamp__u:5937: tato 'sya nandī kulisena tṛrṇa śiro 'cchinat tālaphalaprakāśam /
GP12vamp__u:5938: hato 'tha bhūmau nipapāta vegād daityāśca bhītā vigatā diśo daśa // VamP_42.48 //
GP12vamp__u:5939: tato hataṃ svaṃ tanayaṃ nirīkṣya hastī tadā nandinamājagāma /
GP12vamp__u:5943: parāṅmukhān vīkṣya gaṇān kumāraḥ śaktyā pṛṣatkāntha vārayitvā /
GP12vamp__u:5944: tūrṇaṃ sabhabhyetya ripuṃ samīkṣya pragṛhya śaktyā hṛdaye vibheda // VamP_42.51 //
GP12vamp__u:5946: mamāra cāripṛtanā jātā bhūyaḥ parāṅmukhī // VamP_42.52 //
GP12vamp__u:5948: purato nandinaṃ kṛtvā jighāṃsanti sma dānavān // VamP_42.53 //
GP12vamp__u:5956: taṃ paṭṭiśaṃ bhrāmya jaghāna mūrdhni kārtasvaraṃ visvaramunnadantam // VamP_42.57 //
GP12vamp__u:5958: babandha vīraḥ saha paṭṭiśena gaṇeśvaraṃ cāpyatha nandiṣeṇam // VamP_42.58 //
GP12vamp__u:5959: nandiṣeṇaṃ tathā baddhaṃ samīkṣya balināṃ varaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5967: sa tribhiḥ śaṅkarasutaiḥ pīḍyamāno jahau paṇam /
GP12vamp__u:5968: te prāptāḥ śambaraṃ tūrṇaṃ prekṣyamāṇā gaṇeśvarāḥ // VamP_42.63 //
GP12vamp__u:5972: diśo 'tha bheje devarṣe kumāraḥ sainyamardayat // VamP_42.65 //
GP12vamp__u:5974: viṣaṇṇārūpā bhayavihvalāṅgī jagāma sukraṃ śaraṇaṃ bhayārtā // VamP_42.66 //
GP12vamp__u:5979: andhako 'bhyetya śukraṃ tu idaṃ vacanamabravīt // VamP_43.1 //
GP12vamp__u:5982: tadiyaṃ paśya bhagavan mayā guptā varūthinī /
GP12vamp__u:5983: anāthena yathā nārī pramathairapi kālyate // VamP_43.3 //
GP12vamp__u:5986: tasmāt kuruṣva śreyo no na jīyema yathā paraiḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5987: jayema ca parān yuddhe tathā tvaṃ kurtumarhasi // VamP_43.5 //
GP12vamp__u:5990: tvaddhitārtha yatiṣyāmi kariṣyāmi tava priyam // VamP_43.6 //
GP12vamp__u:5994: ye hatāḥ prathamaṃ yuddhe dānavāste samutthitāḥ // VamP_43.8 //
GP12vamp__u:5997: mahādeva vaco mahyaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ paramādbhutam /
GP12vamp__u:5998: avicintyamasahyaṃ ca mṛtānāṃ jīvanaṃ punaḥ // VamP_43.10 //
GP12vamp__u:6000: te samujjīvitā bhūyo bhārgāveṇātha vidyāyā // VamP_43.11 //
GP12vamp__u:6006: ahaṃ taṃ saṃyamiṣyāmi yathāyogaṃ sametya hi // VamP_43.14 //
GP12vamp__u:6010: saṃrurodha tadā mārgaṃ sihasyeva paśurvane // VamP_43.16 //
GP12vamp__u:6012: sa papātātha niḥsaṃjño yayau nandī tatastvaran // VamP_43.17 //
GP12vamp__u:6019: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān brahma prāha śakrapurogamān /
GP12vamp__u:6028: rathād bhārgavamākrāmat siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā // VamP_43.25 //
GP12vamp__u:6030: nipātya rakṣiṇaḥ sarvānatha śukraṃ nyavedayat // VamP_43.26 //
GP12vamp__u:6031: tamānītaṃ kaviṃ śarvaḥ prākṣipad vadane prabhuḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6032: bhārgavaṃ tvāvṛtatanuṃ jaṭhare sa nyaveśayat // VamP_43.27 //
GP12vamp__u:6037: śaṅkarāya maheśāya tryambakāya namo namaḥ // VamP_43.29 //
GP12vamp__u:6039: madanāgne kālaśatro vāmadevāya te namaḥ // VamP_43.30 //
GP12vamp__u:6041: mahādevāya śarvāya īśvarāya namo namaḥ // VamP_43.31 //
GP12vamp__u:6042: trinayana hara bhava śaṅkara umāpate jīmūtaketo śuhāgṛha śmaśānanirata bhūtivilepana sūlapāṇe paśupate gopate tatpuruṣasattma namo namaste /
GP12vamp__u:6043: itthaṃ stutaḥ kavivarema haro 'tha bhaktyā prīto varaṃ varaya dadmi tavetyuvāca /
GP12vamp__u:6044: sa prāha devavara dehi varaṃ mamādya yadvai tavaiva jaṭharāt pratinirgamo 'stu // VamP_43.32 //
GP12vamp__u:6045: tato haro 'kṣīṇi tadā nirudhya prāha dvijendrādya vinirgamasva /
GP12vamp__u:6046: ityuktamātro vibhunā cacāra devodare bhārgavapuṅgavastu // VamP_43.33 //
GP12vamp__u:6052: vṛkṣagulmān girīn vallyaḥ phalamūlauṣadhāni ca // VamP_43.36 //
GP12vamp__u:6057: tatrāsato bhārgavasya divyaḥ saṃvatsaro gataḥ // VamP_43.38 //
GP12vamp__u:6059: sa śrantaṃ vīkṣya cātmānaṃ nālabhannirgamaṃ vaśī /
GP12vamp__u:6063: sahasrākṣa mahādeva tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_43.40 //
GP12vamp__u:6064: namo 'stu te śaṅkara śarva śaṃbho sahasranetrāṅghribhujaṅgabhūṣaṇa /
GP12vamp__u:6065: dṛṣṭvaiva sarvān bhuvanāṃstavodare śrānto bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannaḥ // VamP_43.41 //
GP12vamp__u:6066: ityevamukte vacane mahātmā śaṃbhurvacaḥ prāha tato vihasya /
GP12vamp__u:6067: nirgaccha putro 'si mamādhunā tvaṃ śiśnena bho bhārgavavaṃśacandra // VamP_43.42 //
GP12vamp__u:6068: nāmnā tu śukreti carācarāstvāṃ stoṣyanti naivātra vicāramanyat /
GP12vamp__u:6069: ityevamuktvā bhagavān mumoca śiśnena śukraṃ sa ca nirjagāma // VamP_43.43 //
GP12vamp__u:6071: praṇamya śaṃbhuṃ sa jagāma tūrṇa mahāsurāṇāṃ balamuttamaujāḥ // VamP_43.44 //
GP12vamp__u:6075: yuyudhuḥ saṃkulaṃ yuddhaṃ sarva eva jayepsavaḥ // VamP_43.46 //
GP12vamp__u:6085: hastī ca kuṇḍajaṭharaṃ hlādo vīraṃ ghaṭodaram /
GP12vamp__u:6086: ete hi balināṃ śreṣṭhā dānavāḥ pramathāstathā /
GP12vamp__u:6087: saṃyodhayanti devarṣe divyābdānāṃ śatani ṣaṭ // VamP_43.51 //
GP12vamp__u:6089: vārayāmāsa balavān jambho nāma mahāsuraḥ // VamP_43.52 //
GP12vamp__u:6093: dvimūrdhā pavanaṃ somaṃ rāhurmitraṃ virūpadhṛk // VamP_43.54 //
GP12vamp__u:6094: aṣṭau ye vasavaḥ khyātā dharādyāste mahāsurān /
GP12vamp__u:6099: eka eva raṇe raudraḥ kālanemirmahāsuraḥ // VamP_43.57 //
GP12vamp__u:6105: kṛtāni ca surābdānāṃ daśatīḥ ṣaṭ mahāmune // VamP_43.60 //
GP12vamp__u:6107: tadā māyaṃ samāśritya grasantaḥ kramaśo 'vyayān // VamP_43.61 //
GP12vamp__u:6110: dṛṣṭvā śūnyaṃ giriprasthaṃ grastāṃś ca pramathāmarān /
GP12vamp__u:6113: vadanaṃ vikṛtaṃ kṛtvā muktaśastraṃ vijṛmbhire // VamP_43.64 //
