GP12vamp__u:8177: yugāntaśeṣaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ taṃ devadevaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // VamP_58.44 //
GP12vamp__u:8178: yogeśvaraṃ cāruvicitramaulim ajñeyam agryaṃ prakṛteḥ parastham /
GP12vamp__u:8179: kṣetrajñamātmaprabhavaṃ vareṇyaṃ taṃ vāsudevaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadya // VamP_58.45 //
GP12vamp__u:8181: vadanti yaṃ vai puruṣaṃ sanātanaṃ taṃ devaguhyaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // VamP_58.46 //
GP12vamp__u:8182: yadakṣaraṃ brahma vadanti sarvagaṃ niśamya yaṃ mṛtyumukhāt pramucyate /
GP12vamp__u:8183: tamīśvaraṃ tṛptamanuttamairguṇaiḥ parāyaṇaṃ viṣṇumupaimi sāśvatam // VamP_58.47 //
GP12vamp__u:8185: mahābalaṃ vedanidhiṃ sureśaṃ va3jāmi viṣṇuṃ śaraṇaṃ janārdanam // VamP_58.48 //
GP12vamp__u:8188: bhavodbhavaṃ vedavidāṃ pariṣṭhaṃ yogātmanāṃ sāṃkhyavidāṃ variṣṭham /
GP12vamp__u:8193: prapadye muktasaṃgānāṃ yatīnāṃ paramāṃ gatim // VamP_58.52 //
GP12vamp__u:8195: śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ bhaktyā prapadye bhaktavatsalam // VamP_58.53 //
GP12vamp__u:8200: namo varāya devāya namaḥ sarvasahāya ca /
GP12vamp__u:8205: kīrtayanti ca yaṃ sarve brahmādīnāṃ parāyaṇam // VamP_58.58 //
GP12vamp__u:8207: subrahmaṇya namaste 'stu trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam // VamP_58.59 //
GP12vamp__u:8213: grāhagrastaṃ gajendraṃ taṃ taṃ ca grāhaṃ jalāśayāt /
GP12vamp__u:8218: grāhatvamagamat kṛṣṇād vadhaṃ prāpya divaṃ gataḥ // VamP_58.64 //
GP12vamp__u:8219: gajo 'pi viṣṇunā spṛṣṭo jāto divyavapuḥ pumān /
GP12vamp__u:8222: abhavat tvatha deveśastābhyāṃ caiva prapūjitaḥ // VamP_58.66 //
GP12vamp__u:8223: idaṃ ca bhagavān yogī gajendraṃ śaraṇāgatam /
GP12vamp__u:8226: yo māṃ tvāñca saraścaiva grāhasya ca vidāraṇam /
GP12vamp__u:8230: kīrtayiṣyanti bhaktyā ca śroṣyanti ca śucivrataḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8231: duḥsvapno naśyate teṣāṃ susvapnaśca bhaviṣyati // VamP_58.70 //
GP12vamp__u:8232: mātsyaṃ kaurmañca vārāhaṃ vāmanaṃ tārkṣyameva ca /
GP12vamp__u:8238: sparśayāmāsa hastena gajaṃ gandharvameva ca // VamP_58.73 //
GP12vamp__u:8244: gataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇurdurvijñeyagatiḥ prabhuḥ // VamP_58.76 //
GP12vamp__u:8246: vavandire mahātmānaṃ prabhuṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim // VamP_58.77 //
GP12vamp__u:8252: prāpnuyāt paramāṃ siddhiṃ duḥsvapnastasya naśyati // VamP_58.80 //
GP12vamp__u:8256: etatpavitraṃ paramaṃ supuṇyaṃ saṃkīrtanīyaṃ caritaṃ murāreḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8257: yasmin kilokte bahupāpabandhanāt labhyeta mokṣo dviradena yadvat // VamP_58.82 //
GP12vamp__u:8258: ajaṃ vareṇyaṃ varapadmanābhaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ brahmanidhiṃ sureśam /
GP12vamp__u:8259: taṃ devaguhyaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ vandāmyahaṃ lokapatiṃ vareṇyam // VamP_58.83 //
GP12vamp__u:8261: etat tavoktaṃ pravaraṃ stavānāṃ stavaṃ murārervaranāgakīrtanam /
GP12vamp__u:8262: yaṃ kīrtya saṃśrutya tathā vicintya pāpāpanodaṃ puruṣo labheta // VamP_58.84 //
GP12vamp__u:8269: sa tvāyuṣi parikṣiṇe jajñe ghoro niśācaraḥ // VamP_59.2 //
GP12vamp__u:8271: kruraiścakre tato vṛttiṃ rākṣasatvād viśeṣataḥ // VamP_59.3 //
GP12vamp__u:8274: yaṃ yaṃ paśyati sattvaṃ sa taṃ tamādāya rākṣasaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8277: jagāma ca mahān kālaḥ pariṇāmaṃ tathā vayaḥ // VamP_59.6 //
GP12vamp__u:8293: te yāntu saumyatāṃ sadyo garuḍeneva pannagāḥ // VamP_59.14 //
GP12vamp__u:8294: ye kūṣmāṇḍāstathā yakṣā daityā ye ca niśācarāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8295: pretā vināyakāḥ krūrā manuṣyā jṛmbhakāḥ khagāḥ // VamP_59.15 //
GP12vamp__u:8297: sarve bhavantu me saumyā viṣṇucakraravāhatāḥ // VamP_59.16 //
GP12vamp__u:8298: cittavṛttiharā ye ca ye janāḥ smṛtīhārakāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8304: pṛṣṭhe purastādatha dakṣiṇottare vikoṇataścāstu najārdano hariḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8305: tamīḍyamīśānamanantamacyutaṃ janārdanaṃ praṇipatito na sīdati // VamP_59.20 //
GP12vamp__u:8306: yathā paraṃ brahma haristathā paraṃ jagatsvarūpaśca sa eva keśavaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8313: jāte japyāvasāne 'sau ta dadarśa niśācaram // VamP_59.24 //
GP12vamp__u:8315: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛpayāviṣṭaḥ samāśvāsya niśācaram // VamP_59.25 //
GP12vamp__u:8317: svabhāvamātmano draṣṭuṃ rakṣayā tejasaḥ kṣitim // VamP_59.26 //
GP12vamp__u:8318: kathayitvā ca tadrakṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ vividhaṃ tataḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8319: prasīdetyabravīd vipraṃ nirviṇṇāḥ svena karmaṇā // VamP_59.27 //
GP12vamp__u:8321: kṛtāḥ striyo mayā bahvyo vidhavāḥ putravarjitāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8322: anāgasāṃ ca sattvānāmalpakānāṃ kṣayaḥ kṛtaḥ // VamP_59.28 //
GP12vamp__u:8326: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasasya dvijottamaḥ // VamP_59.30 //
GP12vamp__u:8331: tvāṃ vai samāgato 'smyadya kṣipto 'haṃ rakṣayā balāt /
GP12vamp__u:8332: tava saṃsargato brahman jāto nirveda uttamaḥ // VamP_59.32 //
GP12vamp__u:8333: kā sā rakṣā na tāṃ vedmi vedmi nāsyāḥ parāyaṇam /
GP12vamp__u:8334: yasyāḥ saṃsargasāsādya nirvedaṃ prāpitaṃ param // VamP_59.33 //
GP12vamp__u:8336: yathā pāpāpanodo me bhavatyārya tathā kuru // VamP_59.34 //
GP12vamp__u:8338: ityevamuktaḥ sa munistadā vai tena rakṣasā /
GP12vamp__u:8339: pratyuvāca mahābhāgo vimṛśya suciraṃ muniḥ // VamP_59.35 //
GP12vamp__u:8344: tān saṃpṛccha dvijān saumya ye vai pravacane ratāḥ // VamP_59.37 //
GP12vamp__u:8347: na cakhāda sa sattvāni kṣudhā saṃbādhito 'pi san /
GP12vamp__u:8348: ṣaṣṭhe ṣaṣṭhe tadā kāle jantumekamabhakṣayat // VamP_59.39 //
GP12vamp__u:8351: gṛhīto rakṣasā tena sa tadā munidārakaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8352: nirāśo jīvite prāha sāmapūrvaṃ niśācaram // VamP_59.41 //
GP12vamp__u:8354: bho bhadra brūhi yat kāryaṃ gṛhīto yena hetunā /
GP12vamp__u:8355: tadanubrūhi bhadraṃ te ayamasmyanuśādhi mām // VamP_59.42 //
GP12vamp__u:8361: āyāsyāmi tavādyaiva nivedya gurave phalam // VamP_59.44 //
GP12vamp__u:8363: mamātra niṣṭhā prāptasya phalāni viniveditum // VamP_59.45 //
GP12vamp__u:8367: ṣaṣṭhe kāle na me brahman kaścid grahaṇamāgataḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8368: pratimucyeta devo 'pi iti me pāpājīvikā // VamP_59.47 //
GP12vamp__u:8369: eka evātra mokṣasya tava hetuḥ śṛṇuṣva tat /
GP12vamp__u:8373: tatkariṣyāmyahaṃ rakṣo yanna vrataharaṃ mama // VamP_59.49 //
GP12vamp__u:8376: nirvivekena cittena pāpakarma sadā kṛtam // VamP_59.50 //
GP12vamp__u:8377: ābālyānmama pāpeṣu na dharmeṣu rataṃ manaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8378: tatpāpāsaṃkṣayānmokṣaṃ prāpnuyāṃ yena tad vada // VamP_59.51 //
GP12vamp__u:8380: duṣṭāṃ yonimimāṃ prāpya tanmuktiṃ kathaya dvija // VamP_59.52 //
GP12vamp__u:8384: ṣaṣṭhe kāle nṛśaṃsātmā bhakṣayiṣyāmi nirghṛṇaḥ // VamP_59.54 //
GP12vamp__u:8388: sa vimṛśya ciraṃ vipraḥ śaraṇaṃ jātavedasam /
GP12vamp__u:8389: jagāma jñānadānāya saṃśayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ // VamP_59.56 //
GP12vamp__u:8391: vratāni vā sucīrṇāni saptārciḥ pātu māṃ tataḥ // VamP_59.57 //
GP12vamp__u:8392: na mātaraṃ na pitaraṃ gauraveṇa yathā gurum /
GP12vamp__u:8393: sarvadaivāvagacchāmi tathā māṃ pātu pāvakaḥ // VamP_59.58 //
GP12vamp__u:8394: yathā guruṃ na manasā karmaṇā vacasāpi vā /
GP12vamp__u:8395: avajānāmyahaṃ tena pātu satyena pāvakaḥ // VamP_59.59 //
GP12vamp__u:8396: ityevaṃ manasā satyān kurvataḥ śapathān punaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8399: mā bhairdvijasutāhaṃ tvāṃ mokṣayiṣyāmi saṃkaṭāt // VamP_59.61 //
GP12vamp__u:8400: yadasya rakṣasaḥ śreyo jihvāgre saṃsthitā tava /
GP12vamp__u:8401: tat sarvaṃ kathayiṣyāmi tato mokṣamavāpsyasi // VamP_59.62 //
GP12vamp__u:8402: adṛśyā rakṣasā tena proktvetthaṃ sā sarasvatī /
GP12vamp__u:8403: adarśānaṃ gatā so 'pi dvijaḥ prāha niśācaram // VamP_59.63 //
GP12vamp__u:8408: asaṃśayaṃ sadā japyo japatāṃ puṣṭiśāntidaḥ // VamP_59.65 //
GP12vamp__u:8409: oṃ hariṃ kuṣṇaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ vāsudevaṃ janārdanam /
GP12vamp__u:8410: praṇato 'smi jagannāthaṃ sa me pāpaṃ vyapohatu // VamP_59.66 //
GP12vamp__u:8412: praṇato 'smi paraṃ devaṃ sa me pāpaṃ vyapohatu // VamP_59.67 //
GP12vamp__u:8414: praṇato 'smi patiṃ lakṣmyāḥ sa me pāpaṃ vyapohatu // VamP_59.68 //
GP12vamp__u:8416: praṇato 'smi stutaṃ stutyaiḥ sa me pāpaṃ vyapohatu // VamP_59.69 //
GP12vamp__u:8418: praṇato 'smi dharādhāraṃ sa me pāpaṃ vyapohatu // VamP_59.70 //
GP12vamp__u:8420: praṇato 'smi mahābāhuṃ sa me pāpaṃ vyapohatu // VamP_59.71 //
GP12vamp__u:8422: praṇato 'smi śriyaḥ kāntaṃ sa me pāpaṃ vyapohatu // VamP_59.72 //
GP12vamp__u:8426: dhyāyanti vāsudevākhyaṃ tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_59.74 //
GP12vamp__u:8428: vāsudevaṃ paraṃ brahma tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_59.75 //
GP12vamp__u:8430: karmakṣaye 'kṣayaṃ devaṃ tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_59.76 //
GP12vamp__u:8432: na yoginaḥ prāpnuvanti tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_59.77 //
GP12vamp__u:8434: yaḥ sṛjatyacyuto devastamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_59.78 //
GP12vamp__u:8436: prabhuḥ purātano jajñe tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_59.79 //
GP12vamp__u:8438: sraṣṭṛtve saṃsthitaṃ sṛṣṭau praṇato 'smi sanātanam // VamP_59.80 //
GP12vamp__u:8441: dhṛtā mahī hatā daityāḥ paritrātāstathā surāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8442: yena taṃ viṣṇumādyeśaṃ praṇato 'smi janārdanam // VamP_59.82 //
GP12vamp__u:8444: taṃ yajñapuruṣaṃ viṣṇuṃ praṇato 'smi sanātanam // VamP_59.83 //
GP12vamp__u:8448: yo vai nṛtyati rudrātmā praṇato 'smi janārdanam // VamP_59.85 //
GP12vamp__u:8450: saṃbhūtā yasya devasya sarvagaṃ taṃ namāmyaham // VamP_59.86 //
GP12vamp__u:8452: yasyāṃśabhūtā devasya sarvagaṃ taṃ nato 'smayaham // VamP_59.87 //
GP12vamp__u:8454: ekāṃśabhūtā devasya sarvagaṃ taṃ namāmyaham // VamP_59.88 //
GP12vamp__u:8455: yasmānnānyat paraṃ kiñcid yasmin sarvaṃ mahātmani /
GP12vamp__u:8456: yaḥ sarvamadhyago 'nantaḥ sarvagaṃ taṃ namāmyaham // VamP_59.89 //
GP12vamp__u:8458: viṣṇurevaṃ tathā pāpaṃ mamāśeṣaṃ praṇaśyatu // VamP_59.90 //
GP12vamp__u:8460: yacca jñānaparicchedyaṃ pāpaṃ naśyatu me tathā // VamP_59.91 //
GP12vamp__u:8462: anekajanmakarmotthaṃ pāpaṃ naśyatu me tathā // VamP_59.92 //
GP12vamp__u:8464: saṃdhyayośca kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ karmaṇā manasā girā // VamP_59.93 //
GP12vamp__u:8465: yat tiṣṭhatā yad vrajatā yacca śayyāgatena me /
GP12vamp__u:8466: kṛtaṃ yadaśubhaṃ karma kāyena manasā girā // VamP_59.94 //
GP12vamp__u:8468: tat kṣipraṃ vilayaṃ yātu vāsudevasya kīrtanāt // VamP_59.95 //
GP12vamp__u:8471: yacca bhojye tathā peye bhakṣye coṣye vilehane /
GP12vamp__u:8472: tad yātu vilayaṃ toye yathā lavaṇabhājanam // VamP_59.97 //
GP12vamp__u:8473: yad bālye yacca kaumāre yat pāpaṃ yauvane mama /
GP12vamp__u:8474: vayaḥpariṇatau yacca yacca janmātare kṛtam // VamP_59.98 //
GP12vamp__u:8476: prayātu vilayaṃ toye yathā lavaṇabhājanam // VamP_59.99 //
GP12vamp__u:8478: janārdanāya kṛṣṇāya namo bhūyo namo namaḥ // VamP_59.100 //
GP12vamp__u:8482: ko 'nyo nāśayati balād darpaṃ haihayabhūpateḥ // VamP_59.102 //
GP12vamp__u:8490: kṛtaṃ tena tu yat pāpaṃ saptajanmāntarāṇi vai /
GP12vamp__u:8495: ahanyahani yo dadyāt paṭhatyetacca tatsamam // VamP_59.108 //
GP12vamp__u:8498: yathaitat stayamuktaṃ me na hyalpamapi me mṛṣā /
GP12vamp__u:8504: etad bhadra mayā khyātaṃ tava pātakanāśanam /
GP12vamp__u:8505: viṣṇoḥ sārasvataṃ stotraṃ yajjagāda sarasvatī // VamP_59.112 //
GP12vamp__u:8507: jagādainaṃ stavaṃ viṣṇoḥ sarveṣāṃ copaśāntidam // VamP_59.113 //
GP12vamp__u:8509: tataḥ śāpāpanodaṃ tu stute lapsyasi keśave // VamP_59.114 //
GP12vamp__u:8511: stuhi bhaktiṃ dṛḍhāṃ kṛtvā tataḥ pāpād vimokṣyase // VamP_59.115 //
GP12vamp__u:8513: stuto hi bhaktyā nṝṇāṃ vai sarvapāpaharo hariḥ // VamP_59.116 //
GP12vamp__u:8515: tataḥ praṇamya taṃ vipraṃ prasādya sa niśācaraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8516: tadaiva tapase śrīmān śālagrāmamagād vaśī // VamP_59.117 //
GP12vamp__u:8517: aharniśaṃ sa evainaṃ japan sārasvataṃ stavam /
GP12vamp__u:8521: etat te kathitaṃ brahman viṣṇoḥ sārasvataṃ stavam /
GP12vamp__u:8523: ya etat paramaṃ stotraṃ vāsudevasya mānavaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8524: paṭhaṣyati sa sarvebhyaḥ pāpebhyo mokṣamāpsyati // VamP_59.121 //
GP12vamp__u:8529: vāsudeva namaste 'stu bahurūpa namo 'stu te // VamP_60.1 //
GP12vamp__u:8533: dhruvadhvaja namasto 'stu satyadhvaja namo 'stu te // VamP_60.3 //
GP12vamp__u:8537: namo jayanta vijaya jayānanta parājita // VamP_60.5 //
GP12vamp__u:8543: namo hiraṇyagarbhāya padmagarbhāya te namaḥ // VamP_60.8 //
GP12vamp__u:8545: kālanābha namastubhyaṃ mahānābha namo namaḥ // VamP_60.9 //
GP12vamp__u:8547: dharmāvāsa jalāvāsa śrīnivāsa namo 'stu te // VamP_60.10 //
GP12vamp__u:8549: senādhyakṣa namastubhyaṃ kālādhyakṣa namo namaḥ // VamP_60.11 //
GP12vamp__u:8554: sarvātman sarvaga vibho viriñce śveta keśava /
GP12vamp__u:8555: nīla rakta mahānīla aniruddha namo 'stu te // VamP_60.14 //
GP12vamp__u:8557: vyomakātmaka subrahman bhūtātmaka namo 'stu te // VamP_60.15 //
GP12vamp__u:8559: muñjakeśa hṛṣīkeśa sarvanātha mano 'stu te // VamP_60.16 //
GP12vamp__u:8563: govinda prītikartā ca haṃsa pītāmbarapriya // VamP_60.18 //
GP12vamp__u:8570: namaste dharmanetrāya mahānetrāya te namaḥ // VamP_60.21 //
GP12vamp__u:8572: namo yajñavarāhāya mahārūpāya te namaḥ // VamP_60.22 //
GP12vamp__u:8577: mūlaṃ te brāhmaṇā brahman skandhaste kṣatriyordiśaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8579: brāhmaṇāḥ sāgnayo vaktrāḥ derdaṇḍāḥ sāyudhā nṛpāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8581: netrād bhānurabhūt tubhyaṃ padbhyāṃ bhūḥ śrotrayordiśaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8583: prāṇād vāyuḥ samabhavat kāmād brahmā pitāmahaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8584: krodhāt trinayano rudraḥ śīrṣṇoḥ dyauḥ samavartata // VamP_60.28 //
GP12vamp__u:8586: oṣadhyo romasaṃbhūtā virājastvaṃ namo 'stu te // VamP_60.29 //
GP12vamp__u:8588: oṅkārastvaṃ vaṣaṭkāro vauṣaṭ tvaṃ ca svadhā sudhā // VamP_60.30 //
GP12vamp__u:8590: sarvākāra nirākāra vedākāra namo 'stu te // VamP_60.31 //
GP12vamp__u:8594: namaḥ sahasradhārāya śatadhārāya te namaḥ // VamP_60.33 //
GP12vamp__u:8596: suvarṇabrahmadātre ca sarvadātre ca te namaḥ // VamP_60.34 //
GP12vamp__u:8598: parabrahma namaste 'stu śabdabrahma namo 'stu te // VamP_60.35 //
GP12vamp__u:8600: buddhistvamapi bodhyaśca bodhastvaṃ ca namo 'stu te // VamP_60.36 //
GP12vamp__u:8602: pātā potā ca putaśca pāvanīyaśca oṃ namaḥ // VamP_60.37 //
GP12vamp__u:8603: hantā ca hanyamānaś ca hrimāṇastvameva ca /

GP12vamp__u:9035: tasya mātāgamat kūpaṃ tamandhaṃ śilayācitam // VamP_64.50 //

GP12vamp__u:9691: etanmayā puṇyatamaṃ purāṇaṃ tubhyaṃ tathā nārada kīrtitaṃ vai /

GP12vamp__u:9700: 69.5 snāne kṛte tīrthavare supuṇye gaṅgājale naimiṣapuṣkare vā /
